sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

sense.def: relative nobility

tls:text.tls:line: five tasks to be completed that will determine prosperity or poverty,

sense.def: flourishing versus decline

tls:text.tls:line: Exort them to be diligent in improving24 [the morals] of the masses.

sense.def: it is imperative to V; it is obligatory that one should V

sense.def: season

sense.def: all of the subjects

sense.def: 此三者

tls:text.tls:line: the state small but its capital large, there will be assasinations.

sense.def: enfeoffed city; administrative centre (of a district); by Han times: capital of a kingdom within the empire; the reference is frequently to a capital: 宋都 would appear to refer to the capital of Sòng and not to any city or administrative centre of of Sòng.

tls:text.tls:line: Should the realm have two sons of Heaven,

sense.def: supposing that, counter to fact; supposing that as a theoretical possibility

tls:text.tls:line: Should the realm have two sons of Heaven,

sense.def: have two, contain two

tls:text.tls:line: Should the realm have two sons of Heaven,

sense.def: so-and-so many Sons of Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: or a single family two fathers,

sense.def: have two, contain two

tls:text.tls:line: Now, a lord protector or king

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:text.tls:line: If these things can be effected,

sense.def: employ on a mission; send out as representative or ambassador; send as an emissary (to a place) (to do something)

tls:text.tls:line: If these things can be effected,

sense.def: the capable, the mighty, 尊賢使能

tls:text.tls:line: There are [certain] conditions that distinguish a lord protector or king.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:text.tls:line: They are superior in terms of virtue and righteousness,

sense.def: high moral virtue, high moral principles and rectitude; moral integrity and rectitude

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom and stratagems,

sense.def: of wisdom/wise 智士,智謀

tls:text.tls:line: Now, he who is skilled in manipulating states

sense.def: govern (a state, as prime minister etc); be de facto in charge of

tls:text.tls:line: to talk about the influence of a king.

sense.def: intellectually stupid and morally insensitive (of persons and opinions etc)

tls:text.tls:line: to talk about the influence of a king.

sense.def: wisdom; BUDDH: perfect insight, wisdom skr. prajñā

tls:text.tls:line: to talk about the influence of a king.

sense.def: sometimes: degree of wisdom 愚人之智

tls:text.tls:line: it is a defeatist strategy

sense.def: always 霸: characteristic of a hegemon 霸道

tls:text.tls:line: Thus a condition that distinguishes a king is magnanimity.

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:text.tls:line: by attacking them.

sense.def: military-style harshness

tls:text.tls:line: in leaving them alone.

sense.def: civil flexibility (as opposed to militarist severity)

tls:text.tls:line: From ancient times to the present,

sense.def: from N1 until N2 自從。。。至於

tls:text.tls:line: and [attempted to] alter its condition.

sense.def: achievements and fame; (justified) reputation

tls:text.tls:line: such are the political methods of a king.

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: Becoming a lord protector or king does not lie [merely] in perfecting regulations.1204

sense.def: becoming a preeminent ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: QUERIES, GUAN 24.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.10; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 368;

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever [the ruler] holds court,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: QUERIES, GUAN 24.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.10; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 368;

tls:text.tls:line: if salaries are given to those who are meritorious.

sense.def: die for (an ideal etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.02; ed; WYWK 2.10; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 368f;

tls:text.tls:line: If he does not bring disorder to the altars of Land and Grain and the ancestral temples,

sense.def: our altars of the land and grain; the altars of the land and grain of the subject of the sentence

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.02; ed; WYWK 2.10; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 368f;

tls:text.tls:line: If he does not bring disorder to the altars of Land and Grain and the ancestral temples,

sense.def: ancestral temples, temples for the ancestors (symbols of the nation, see this word under NATION)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.03; ed; WYWK 2.10; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 369;

tls:text.tls:line: These are the political methods of the lord protector to the king.

sense.def: a preeminent ruler in general

tls:text.tls:srcline:
問獨夫、
寡婦、
孤窮、疾病者幾何人也？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.06; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 369;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire how many persons are unmarried, widowed, destitute,1216 and sick.

sense.def: the bereaved; orphans and widows

tls:text.tls:srcline:
問獨夫、
寡婦、
孤窮、疾病者幾何人也？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.06; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 369;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire how many persons are unmarried, widowed, destitute,1216 and sick.

sense.def: suffer from a serious illness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.07; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 369f;

tls:text.tls:line: What are their clan distinctions?

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.08; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 370;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire in how many families the chief heir

sense.def: eldest son; most senior person in the generation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.08; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 370;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire in how many families the chief heir

sense.def: senior and junior cousins as well as brothers

tls:text.tls:srcline: 外人之來從而未有田宅者幾何家？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.09; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 370;

tls:text.tls:line: How many families of foreigners have come to serve us1223 but do not yet have fields and houses?

sense.def: stranger; outsider; foreigner

tls:text.tls:srcline: 身出以家臣自代者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 370;

tls:text.tls:line: officials disparage performing clerical tasks and services1225 of a personal nature, and so use their private servants to substitute for them [at work]?

sense.def: replace (oneself); have (oneself) replaced

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.11; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 370;

tls:text.tls:line: How many

sense.def: stranger; outsider; foreigner

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.12; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: and hold contracts in the form of tallies.

sense.def: separated out, divided into parts

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.12; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: do people do in the districts and villages?

sense.def: be what? also: 復是何物？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire about men and women who possess skills.

sense.def: entertaining trick, attractive skill [also general: skill in any field][CA]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: How many women who have remained [unmarried] at home occupy themselves with [women's] work?

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline: 問國所開口而食者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquirē230 how many men in the country merely open their mouths to be fed.

sense.def: how many

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire about the total number of war chariots.

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline: 牽家馬軛家車者幾何乘？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: How many teams are there of privately owned draft horses yoked to privately owned vehicles?

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline: 可使帥眾莅百姓者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: sufficiently to teach others and can be employed to lead the masses and oversee the hundred surnames?

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 可使帥眾莅百姓者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: sufficiently to teach others and can be employed to lead the masses and oversee the hundred surnames?

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline: 士之急難可使者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: How many knights can be employed in time of emergency?

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline: 可以修城郭、補守備者幾何人？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: or who, while remaining at home, can build walls and repair defense work?

sense.def: how many

tls:text.tls:srcline:
甲兵、
兵車、
旌旗、
鼓鐃、
帷幕、帥車之載幾何乘？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371;

tls:text.tls:line: How many war chariots are there to go with the armed troops and how many chariots are used by the commanders to carry banners and flags, and cymbals, canopies and tents?

sense.def: smallish handbell with a handle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371f;

tls:text.tls:line: What is the state of completion

sense.def: production 造修之具

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.12; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 371f;

tls:text.tls:line: What is the state of completion

sense.def: act of building/producing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372;

tls:text.tls:line: the making of weapons should be limited to the winter time.

sense.def: produce (fruit etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372;

tls:text.tls:line: the making of weapons should be limited to the winter time.

sense.def: weapons

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372f;

tls:text.tls:line: Now, with regard to the width of city and suburban walls,

sense.def: relative thickness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372f;

tls:text.tls:line: the depth of ditches and moats,

sense.def: the ditches, gullies and waterways (into which dead bodies are thrown)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372f;

tls:text.tls:line: the depth of ditches and moats,

sense.def: relative physical depth

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 372f;

tls:text.tls:line: and the height of outer and inner gates,

sense.def: relative nobility

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 373;

tls:text.tls:line: Inquire how many years

sense.def: major administrative and ritual centre, local centre at the lower administrative level immediately below the state capital

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.13; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 373;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to increase the benefits to human livelihood?

sense.def: be what? also: 復是何物？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.24; ed; WYWK 2.14; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 374;

tls:text.tls:line: and let moral force create close ties among the nine regions [of the empire].1256

sense.def: build up (good relations etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.14; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 375;

tls:text.tls:line: Inform1264 the civil functionaries at the border:

sense.def: marginal, near the border; on the border; border- 邊吏

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.14; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 375;

tls:text.tls:line: Unite in harmony with the states on our four borders

sense.def: tie together in harmonious interaction

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 24.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.14; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 375;

tls:text.tls:line: and richily entertain1268 [the rulers of those states] from the four extremities.'

sense.def: the whole world, right down to the most distant places

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.03; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Huan, leaving [his mat], bowed twice and proclaimed,

sense.def: make a double bow as a show of polite respect (often followed by a knocking of one's head on the ground)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.03; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: 'This is a model to treasure!'

sense.def: precious; sometimes: containing treasure

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.03; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: 'This is a model to treasure!'

sense.def: model

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: 'What has no wings yet flies is reputation.

sense.def: general reputation (good or bad); public appearances

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: Your Grace should be firm in regard to your true self and cautious in respect to your reputation

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: Your Grace should be firm in regard to your true self and cautious in respect to your reputation

sense.def: fame, good name

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: This is called a flourishing of the Way.'

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378;

tls:text.tls:line: This is called a flourishing of the Way.'

sense.def: be called (See COPULA, but note the deep difference between what people say and what ought to be said. The distinction between copula use and the present use must be reworked.CH)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.05; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378f;

tls:text.tls:line: bowed twice

sense.def: make a double bow as a show of polite respect (often followed by a knocking of one's head on the ground)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.05; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378f;

tls:text.tls:line: and requested that [Guan Zhong] continue.

sense.def: like N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.05; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 378f;

tls:text.tls:line: in travelling the dangerous road to his ultimate appointment.'

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.06; ed; WYWK 2.15; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 379;

tls:text.tls:line: bowed twice and said,

sense.def: make a polite double bow addressed to (note that this could be parsed as "bowed to him twice", and this is quite probably the correct analysis.)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.09; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 379;

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the sage esteems the Power and plays down achievement,

sense.def: REGARD AS ELEVATED loan for shàng 尚> put high or highest in one's intellectual hierarchy, exalt, value highly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.09; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 379;

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the sage esteems the Power and plays down achievement,

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.12; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 379f;

tls:text.tls:line: Wide learning without self-reflection

sense.def: reflect upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 380;

tls:text.tls:line: Those who internally fail to examine their filial piety and respect for elders

sense.def: to submit to a close examination; to investigate strictly Shiji: 考信

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 380;

tls:text.tls:line: and abandon1289 these four constant [virtues] for the [mere] chanting of book learning

sense.def: leading thread, warp; cardinal principle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.16; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 380;

tls:text.tls:line: On the following day Duke Huan was at the granarǖ290 shooting arrows

sense.def: shoot birds with stringed short arrows

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 380;

tls:text.tls:line: Duke Huan then repeated what he had said,

sense.def: repeat (words) 再言 "repeat what had been said"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: He himself drove

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and twice paying his respects by bowing his head said,

sense.def: make a double bow as a show of polite respect (often followed by a knocking of one's head on the ground)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and twice paying his respects by bowing his head said,

sense.def: knock one's forehead on the ground and lift it again.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.22; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Guan Zhong and Xi Peng twice paid their respect by bowing their heads and said,

sense.def: make a double bow as a show of polite respect (often followed by a knocking of one's head on the ground)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.22; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Guan Zhong and Xi Peng twice paid their respect by bowing their heads and said,

sense.def: knock one's forehead on the ground and lift it again.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是管仲與桓公盟誓為令曰：

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.23; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon Guan Zhong and Duke Huan swore an oath of allegiance and issued an order saying,

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time (remarkably often after direct speeech: having said this,...; then; at that point, at this juncture; at this stage (in a text); and then; subsequently)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是管仲與桓公盟誓為令曰：

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.23; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon Guan Zhong and Duke Huan swore an oath of allegiance and issued an order saying,

sense.def: swear oath ( with an appeal to the gods to reinforce a promise)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.23; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i1;

tls:text.tls:line: but be forgiven three times and then judged.

sense.def: be dealt with leniently; be forgiven, be pardoned, go scot free

tls:text.tls:srcline: 果三匡天子而九合諸侯。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.24; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Finally he three times assisted1304 the son of Heaven and nine times assembled the feudal lords.

sense.def: assist; act as an assistant to; help out; come to the aid to

tls:text.tls:srcline: 果三匡天子而九合諸侯。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.24; ed; WYWK 2.17; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Finally he three times assisted1304 the son of Heaven and nine times assembled the feudal lords.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.26; ed; WYWK 2.18; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: it is because there are either internal problems

sense.def: cause for worry, thing to worry about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.26; ed; WYWK 2.18; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2;

tls:text.tls:line: Since you have no internal problems,

sense.def: cause for worry, thing to worry about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.18; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2f;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore I will tell you about it.

sense.def: the N therefore V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.18; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i2f;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore I will tell you about it.

sense.def: tell something determinate N1 to (a person N2)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 26.01.28; ed; WYWK 2.18; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 3i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Perhaps the reason [for the lords not visiting you] to an even greater extent lies in your not paying attention to them?'1307

sense.def: probably; presumably; perhaps

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: to judge

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.07; ed; WYWK 2.25; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 402;

tls:text.tls:line: and even persons who are pleasure-seeking, self-indulgent, lazy, and arrogant

sense.def: joke; fool around; play around freely and inconsequentially; be pleasure seeking

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.07; ed; WYWK 2.25; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 402;

tls:text.tls:line: and even persons who are pleasure-seeking, self-indulgent, lazy, and arrogant

sense.def: be remiss; be lazy in performance of one's duty; be listless in performance

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.11; ed; WYWK 2.25; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 402;

tls:text.tls:line: These are called the three constants.

sense.def: be called (See COPULA, but note the deep difference between what people say and what ought to be said. The distinction between copula use and the present use must be reworked.CH)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.25; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: and his subjects do not neglect production,

sense.def: carry out in a lax way; neglect; be lax about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.25; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: and his subjects do not neglect production,

sense.def: (one's own) product; product (of a place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred surnames will extend their allegiance upward to the ruler

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
「君明、
相信、
五官肅、
士廉、
農愚、商工愿，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the brilliance of the prince is fully trusted, the five officers1372 are stern, the gentry above corruption, the peasants simple, and the merchants and artisans honest,

sense.def: gentleman with a right to bear a sword and to ride in a carriage; gentleman, member of the gentry. See Yu Yingshi's monograph and Sivin and Lloyd 2002

tls:text.tls:srcline:
「君明、
相信、
五官肅、
士廉、
農愚、商工愿，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: 'When the brilliance of the prince is fully trusted, the five officers1372 are stern, the gentry above corruption, the peasants simple, and the merchants and artisans honest,

sense.def: be stupid; be simple-minded; be incompetent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: and the sexes will be kept separate.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: looks to the sovereign for his life.

sense.def: rely on N2 for N1

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: the state will flourish.

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 403;

tls:text.tls:line: the state will flourish.

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404;

tls:text.tls:line: The efforts of the hundred surnames

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404;

tls:text.tls:line: the way of the ruler and minister is complete.

sense.def: be completed, be completely achieved; be completely understood; reach perfection

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.24; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404;

tls:text.tls:line: the responsible officials will shirk their duties.

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.25; ed; WYWK 2.26; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404;

tls:text.tls:line: rectifies his virtue in order to manage his people

sense.def: be formally in charge of, deal with (administrative matters); sometimes used as a success verb: deal effectively with, govern properly, lead with natural authority

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: is the prince;

sense.def: a ruler of men

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: those who are skilled themselves

sense.def: contrastive: himself; oneself; the person him/herself (also: 身雖無能)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: serve others.

sense.def: subjects

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: If the prince [exercises] his own skills, he will lack good judgement.

sense.def: contrastive: himself; oneself; the person him/herself (also: 身雖無能)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: If he lacks good judgement,

sense.def: be public-spirited; be even-handed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.27; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 404f;

tls:text.tls:line: and incapable of inflicting punishments.

sense.def: be unable to bear N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.28; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: Such is a state with no law.

sense.def: such a (person etc), a (person) such as him

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.28; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: people will form factions, and below, vie with one another

sense.def: form friendship groups

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.28; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: When laws and regulations have a constant standard,

sense.def: the legal system

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, it is not the discussin of wisdom and ability

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: but the administration of court13ī affairs and the solution of national problems

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: the punishment of wickedness and falsehood,

sense.def: one who deceives> the deceitful and pretending persons

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.30; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: This is why the [true] prince

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.30; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: and treats them according to the law.

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而國未嘗乏於勝任之士，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.31; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: However, a state is never lacking in gentlemen able to assume responsibilities.

sense.def: have a short supply of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而國未嘗乏於勝任之士，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.31; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: However, a state is never lacking in gentlemen able to assume responsibilities.

sense.def: cope successfully with (e.g. violent people), manage to handle properly (a storm etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.32; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.33; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: is the basis for rectifying virtue;

sense.def: moral conduct

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.33; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: When [the ruler] has established his own [virtue], the people will be transformed.

sense.def: be educated and transformed by (superiors)化其上"be transformed by one's superiors"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.33; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: When his virtue has been rectified, the officials will be well regulated.

sense.def: moral conduct

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.33; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405;

tls:text.tls:line: In regulating officials and transforming the people,

sense.def: teach and transform, teach successfully; get to change to the better; educate 化民

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.34; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405f;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, if the sovereign meddles in the affairs of his subjects,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.34; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405f;

tls:text.tls:line: If a state [is beset by] conduct that is disruptive and seditious, perverse and recaltriant,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.34; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 405f;

tls:text.tls:line: If a state [is beset by] conduct that is disruptive and seditious, perverse and recaltriant,

sense.def: inclined to offend others; given to obstreporousness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.35; ed; WYWK 2.27; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: to differentiate relationships and correctly maintain social distinctions is called establishing order.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.36; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: one must not violate the way of self-interest

sense.def: resumptive: these N2, this N2; this fact of N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其大者有侵偪殺上之禍，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.37; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: at the worst there will be the disasters of usurpation and murder of the sovereign;

sense.def: encroach on, exert pressure on; exert undue pressure on (those above or below)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: and will avail themselves of the ability of females

sense.def: rely on

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: and will avail themselves of the ability of females

sense.def: unmarried woman; girl

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: and will avail themselves of the ability of females

sense.def: capability; physical capability, concrete technical capability; potential, capacity 人各有能

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: The women, enjoying this favor, will avail themselves of the knowledge of males

sense.def: favourite; owing one's status to the favour of a ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: The women, enjoying this favor, will avail themselves of the knowledge of males

sense.def: favourites

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: The women, enjoying this favor, will avail themselves of the knowledge of males

sense.def: rely on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 於是乎外夫人而危太子，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.38; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon, they will cast out the consort and endanger the heir apparent.

sense.def: then, thereupon; at that moment

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則有司不敢離法而使矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.39; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 406f;

tls:text.tls:line: so that those in charge will not dare part from the law when serving him.

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.40; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 407;

tls:text.tls:line: Responsible officials receive his commands and carry them out,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.40; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 407;

tls:text.tls:line: while the hundred surnames follow their sovereign, fully adhering to established customs.

sense.def: the people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.41; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 407;

tls:text.tls:line: When the son of Heaven issues orders to the realm

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.41; ed; WYWK 2.28; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 407;

tls:text.tls:line: and younger brothers obey their elder brothers -

sense.def: eldest brother, male of the eldest brother's status (note that 其兄 is "his elder brother" and not specifically "his eldest brother".)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.44; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, whatever his goodness, the son of Heaven

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.44; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408;

tls:text.tls:line: offer1392 it to the son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.45; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408;

tls:text.tls:line: This is the source of both the proper way and the law,

sense.def: from

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故百姓量其力於父兄之閒，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.47; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, the gentry measure out [the fruits of] their efforts among their fathers and elder brothers,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.47; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408;

tls:text.tls:line: so that officials, in judging their virtue and ability, will threat them generously.

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而君發其明府之法瑞以稽之，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.48; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408f;

tls:text.tls:line: Subsequently, the prince brings forth the laws and jade tallies from the illustrious archives to verify [the activities of his officials].1397

sense.def: SHU, yaodian 18: auspicious insignia of rank

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.48; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408f;

tls:text.tls:line: He stands on the third step [leading into the audience hall]

sense.def: the upper side of; upon, on 泰山之上

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.48; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408f;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereby, the sovereign has his leisure,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.48; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408f;

tls:text.tls:line: and the gentry is respectful in supplying [the prince with his due].

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.48; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 408f;

tls:text.tls:line: This is only becausē398 the sovereign has his laws and regulations,

sense.def: the legal system

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而聖王明君，善知而道之者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.49; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 409;

tls:text.tls:line: However, the sage king and enlightened prince understand this well and thus lead [others].

sense.def: the sage king (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而聖王明君，善知而道之者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.49; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 409;

tls:text.tls:line: However, the sage king and enlightened prince understand this well and thus lead [others].

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.50; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 409;

tls:text.tls:line: grasps its importance and behaves accordingly,

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.50; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 409;

tls:text.tls:line: grasps its importance and behaves accordingly,

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.53; ed; WYWK 2.29; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 409;

tls:text.tls:line: This being the case,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.56; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: It is just as when Heaven sends down the right amount of rain,

sense.def: OBI 3: rain 玆雨

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.57; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way [the sovereign] controls the people by not controling them;

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.58; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: the people compared them to a divine power

sense.def: compare (something N1) to (something else N2)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.58; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: the people compared them to a divine power

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.58; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when the people are listened to individually, they are stupid.

sense.def: separately

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.58; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when the people are listened to individually, they are stupid.

sense.def: be stupid; be simple-minded; be incompetent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.59; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, the enlightened prince accords with the hearts of the people,

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.59; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, the enlightened prince accords with the hearts of the people,

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.59; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: they relied on their state to preserve their state

sense.def: And then in such a way; Since S2, then/therefore S1; Thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.60; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Even though one is an enlightened prince,

sense.def: an enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.61; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Consequently, when [a ruler] has the reputation of being an enlightened prince,

sense.def: an enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.61; ed; WYWK 2.30; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410;

tls:text.tls:line: Hence, within the four seas,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.62; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410f;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, when the enlightened prince promotes his subjects,

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.62; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410f;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, when the enlightened prince promotes his subjects,

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.62; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410f;

tls:text.tls:line: he fully understands their weaknesses and strengths.

sense.def: strong and weak points

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.62; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 410f;

tls:text.tls:line: When a worthy person serves his ruler,

sense.def: the worthy person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 30.01.63; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 411;

tls:text.tls:line: men and women of the hundred surnames share in maintaining good order.

sense.def: the people

tls:text.tls:srcline: 古者未有君臣上下之別，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient times there were no distinctions between prince and minister or superior and inferior,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: nor did there exist the union of husband and wife or man and mate.

sense.def: imperial female companion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: nor did there exist the union of husband and wife or man and mate.

sense.def: mate, companion; peer

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: People lived like beasts and dwelt together in herds,

sense.def: (treat, raise) as animal; (live) like a beast

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: People lived like beasts and dwelt together in herds,

sense.def: in a flock, together; by groups

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Consequently, the clever hated the stupid,

sense.def: for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Consequently, the clever hated the stupid,

sense.def: a stupid person; simpleton, dullard

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: The old and young, orphaned and alone

sense.def: the elderly, the aged; an old man

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: The old and young, orphaned and alone

sense.def: one who is young

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: The old and young, orphaned and alone

sense.def: those in any way bereaved

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故智者假眾力以禁強虐，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the wise took advantage of the strength of the masses to restrain the cruelty of the strong,

sense.def: be wise

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故智者假眾力以禁強虐，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the wise took advantage of the strength of the masses to restrain the cruelty of the strong,

sense.def: gain the support of, come to be able to rely on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故智者假眾力以禁強虐，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the wise took advantage of the strength of the masses to restrain the cruelty of the strong,

sense.def: prohibit, forbid, cause to stop, put a stop to prevent, ban; preclude, prevent; constrain; contain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.02; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412f;

tls:text.tls:line: so the people took them as their teachers.

sense.def: treat as a teacher

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.02; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 412f;

tls:text.tls:line: emanated from worthies,

sense.def: the worthies (of a given time and/or place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.03; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: As contradictions arose between what people said and what they did and distinctions emerged between right and wrong,1407

sense.def: rightness or otherwise, appropriateness or otherwise; right and wrong

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: Excessive rewards result in shortages;

sense.def: there is insufficiency of resources

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: excessive punishments result in cruelty.

sense.def: be cruel

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.04; ed; WYWK 2.31; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason the enlightende prince takes care to see that the people are taught to remain in their

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.05; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: If punishments become too cruel, his subjects will not trust him.

sense.def: be cruel

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是胡明君飾食飲弔傷之禮，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.05; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413;

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason the enlightened prince is one who sets forth rules of propriety of feasts and funerals,

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而賢人列士盡功能於上矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.08; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 413f;

tls:text.tls:line: worthy gentlemen and heroic knights will devote all their efforts and abilities to their sovereign.

sense.def: the worthies (of a given time and/or place)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 414;

sense.def: the worthies (of a given time and/or place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 414;

tls:text.tls:line: If the hundred surnames are not employed,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.11; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 414;

tls:text.tls:line: If there is interference with his punishments, the hundred surnames will be in danger.'

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.11; ed; WYWK 2.32; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 414;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the enlightened prince

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred surnames will be happy.

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred surnames will be happy.

sense.def: get delighted; become glad

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: and keeps men and women separate,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: to make virtue flourish, correct mistakes,

sense.def: cause to develop postitively, promote; cause to flourish; bring to fruition

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: to make virtue flourish, correct mistakes,

sense.def: cause to be proper; to correct

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

tls:text.tls:line: and caters to him in order to gain influence over him,

sense.def: flatter, pander to (persons, or 意 "ideas") 阿意

tls:text.tls:line: it is only a matter of sitting and waiting

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.19; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415;

sense.def: wait for (something desirable); wait until; wait for (a period of time); expect

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415f;

sense.def: cause to be dry > exhaust the resources of; use up

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 415f;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it is absolutely necessary that they be clearly established and strictly observed.1421

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 416;

sense.def: pay careful attention to; show special care for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.23; ed; WYWK 2.33; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 416;

sense.def: exocentric: popular [support] , [hearts of] the people

tls:text.tls:line: When an enlightened prince is on high,

sense.def: an enlightened ruler

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.25; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 416;

tls:text.tls:line: and see to it that those licentious and perverse drifters who wander around in search of salaries,

sense.def: misguided, confused

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.25; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 416;

sense.def: the category of people of the category N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred surnames

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.26; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 416f;

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.28; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 417;

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.29; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 417;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.30; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 417f;

sense.def: be good in disposition, be humane in disposition, be of kindly disposition

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: way of heaven>law of nature

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.31; ed; WYWK 2.34; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 418;

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, he who serves as the sovereign belabors his mind but not his physical strength.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.43; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 420;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.44; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 420;

tls:text.tls:line: When men of quality act in accordance with the rules of propriety,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.44; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 420;

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.44; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 420;

tls:text.tls:line: [a prince] will have no difficulty in becoming a king within a short period of time.

sense.def: within a short time

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.46; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 420f;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.47; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 421;

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以下之人無諫死之誋，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.49; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 421;

tls:text.tls:line: In this way, the people under him will have no apprehension about being killed if they were to admonish him,

tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.50; ed; WYWK 2.36; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 421f;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.52; ed; WYWK 2.37; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 422;

tls:text.tls:line: If the various ministers form factions in order to espouse their selfish interests,

sense.def: form friendship groups

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: there is disorder among great ministers,

sense.def: person of ordinary low status, close to 庶人

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.55; ed; WYWK 2.37; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 422f;

tls:text.tls:line: Disorder in the palace arises1462 from jealous squabbling.

sense.def: 妒友 "jealous friend", 妒臣 "jealous minister"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.55; ed; WYWK 2.37; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 422f;

sense.def: be deficient, be in short supply 財匱

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 31.01.59; ed; WYWK 2.38; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 423;

tls:text.tls:line: and employ them to carry out the responsibilities connected with the altars of Land and Grain.

sense.def: our altars of the land and grain; the altars of the land and grain of the subject of the sentence

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:line.loc: MINOR APPRAISALS, GUAN 32.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.38; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 425;

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: MINOR APPRAISALS, GUAN 32.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.38; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 425;

tls:text.tls:line: When beautiful pearls lie in the depths,

sense.def: attractive; wonderful; handsome, splendid, admirable; illustrious (name); elaborate and beautiful, lavish; of soil: be rich and good; of high quality; (also of sounds:) attractiveIn SJ & HS, 好女 and 美女 appear mainly as temptresses, gift objects that corrupt rulers; in this collocation, 好 and 美 would be "attractive." A very large number of females characterised simpl as 美 are prospective brides. 美 (but not 麗 ) is often used in connection with abstracta, such as deeds, words, customs and virtues. [JP]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: MINOR APPRAISALS, GUAN 32.01.01; ed; WYWK 2.38; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 425;

A very large number of females characterised simpl as 美 are prospective brides. 美 (but not 麗 ) is often used in connection with abstracta, such as deeds, words, customs and virtues. [JP]

tls:text.tls:line: "The craftsman1480 had an intuitive grasp of how to use his axe and adze.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: adze, A carpenter's or cooper's tool, like an axe with the blade set at right angles to the handle and curving inwards towards it; used for cutting or slicing away the surface of wood. [Most similar to this description are the tools ill.: CHU 2000: pp. 443 ???]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 32.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.39; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 427;

sense.def: be all dark and black

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.09; ed; WYWK 2.42; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: Like wild animals,

sense.def: animals living in the wild; wild animals

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.09; ed; WYWK 2.42; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: Curses expressed the resentment of the masses,

sense.def: swear oaths against, curse

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.42; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: "Bringing forward their court jesters1520

sense.def: toadying

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.42; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: They dallied with their women,

sense.def: play arounde with; amuse oneself with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.10; ed; WYWK 2.42; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: They galloped their horses without restraint,

sense.def: gallop along, race along

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.11; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: Since their administration was already perverse beyond repair,

sense.def: be wicked and perverse

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.11; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: said Duke Huan.

sense.def: The contextually determinate proposition is highly acceptable> Good!

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「仲父既已語我昔者有道之君，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.12; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: about princes of old who mastered the way [of good government]

sense.def: tell addresse N1 about subject N2 語之故 "tell him the reason"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 仲父不當盡語我昔者有道之臣乎？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.12; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433;

tls:text.tls:line: 'shouldn't you tell in detail about ministers of old who mastered the way

sense.def: tell addresse N1 about subject N2 語之故 "tell him the reason"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.13; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 433f;

tls:text.tls:line: they were certain to put all their efforts

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: They adhered to ancestral virutes

sense.def: act in accordance with; be in accordance with; obey (the law)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: and drew clear distinctions between what conformed or was contrary to them.

sense.def: distinguish properly; be able to draw a distinction between; sort out by making distinctions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: They recomended men of worth

sense.def: a worthy, any worthy; some worthies (with tensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: Their loyalty to the state

sense.def: do one's devoted loyal best for N (also, by way of exception, to the people! ZUO 2.6)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.14; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: Their loyalty to the state

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: When they spoke, it was to devise a plan.

sense.def: speak

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: When they spoke, it was to devise a plan.

sense.def: rare: plans, sheme

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.15; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: Far from him, they acted as a prop.

sense.def: assistant; helper; senior aide; most important minister

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: but refrained from criticizing their princes

sense.def: slander someone behind his back, criticize someone behind his back; complain about somebehind people's back

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.16; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: or detracting from1523 their statements.

sense.def: vilify, speak ill of without good reason; also privately: vilify, calumniate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: said Duke Huan.

sense.def: The contextually determinate proposition is highly acceptable> Good!

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「仲父既以語我昔者有道之臣矣，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: since you have told me about ministers of old who mastered the way [of good government],' said Duke Huan,

sense.def: tell addresse N1 about subject N2 語之故 "tell him the reason"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不當盡語我昔者無道之臣乎？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.17; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434;

tls:text.tls:line: shouldn't you tell me in detail about the ministers of old who lacked the way [of good government]

sense.def: tell addresse N1 about subject N2 語之故 "tell him the reason"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434f;

tls:text.tls:line: and strove never to neglect1524 their own interest.

sense.def: his own [thing/interests]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434f;

tls:text.tls:line: and capitalized on the kindness [of the princes] to promote their own importance.

sense.def: gain the support of, come to be able to rely on

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.18; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 434f;

tls:text.tls:line: and capitalized on the kindness [of the princes] to promote their own importance.

sense.def: capitalise on, make profit by; make profit at the cost of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.19; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: They honored goods and bribes

sense.def: bribes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: "They would flock together with other disreputable persons

sense.def: unfeeling person; cruel person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: to attack those who were worthy.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: Greedy for goods and bribes,

sense.def: be greedy for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: Greedy for goods and bribes,

sense.def: bribes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.20; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: contentious when drinking and feasting,

sense.def: vie for, compete for; compete in 競於; also: compete with 競於楚

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: Rude and arrogant, they had no respect for others.

sense.def: be arrogantly nonchalant in behaviour, be impolitely informal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.21; ed; WYWK 2.43; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: Instead of maintaining friendly relations with good men,

sense.def: show friendship to, give friendly support to; cultivate the friendship of; treat as a friend; gain as a friend

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.22; ed; WYWK 2.44; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: acted on their own authority to create falsē530 orders,

sense.def: create, start up; write up from scratch

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.22; ed; WYWK 2.44; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: acted on their own authority to create falsē530 orders,

sense.def: PRODUCE> to invent, to create for the first time; create anew; create out of nothing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 33.01.23; ed; WYWK 2.44; tr. Rickett 1985, p. 435;

tls:text.tls:line: The flow of goods and bribes into the court,

sense.def: bribes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.44; tr. Rickett 1998:305

tls:text.tls:line: People cultivated their fields to care for themselves

sense.def: nourish (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.44; tr. Rickett 1998:305

tls:text.tls:line: and contributed their surplus to feed the son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:305

tls:text.tls:line: and people remained ignorant of each other's customs.

sense.def: population; the population at large; human beings, humankind

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其獄一踦腓一踦屨而當死。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:305

tls:text.tls:line: "In lieu of the death penalty, criminals wore a straw sandal on one foot and an ordinary shoe on the other.

sense.def: foot; leg

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:305

tls:text.tls:line: yet even those sentenced to death will not submit.

sense.def: destined to die (or be executed); due to be executed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:305f

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason they denigrate the [empty] name [of agriculture] and esteem the reality of [trade and handicraft production].

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:text.tls:srcline: 興時化若何？莫善於侈靡。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:306f

tls:text.tls:line: "Nothing is better than a policy of extravagance in spending (chi mi).

sense.def: be better than N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:306f

tls:text.tls:line: men can be shaped at will.

sense.def: be moulded

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:306f

tls:text.tls:line: Accordingly, the prince should treat grain as having little value but pearls and jade with respect.

sense.def: hold in low esteem; think nothing of; hold in contempt

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the son of Heaven should maintain stores of pearls and jade,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: his feudal lords should maintain stores of musical instruments made of metal and stone,

sense.def: store up; take good care of; store up and collect; store up to keep safe

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred surnames should maintain stores of cloth made of hemp and silk.

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: while the clever will be able to acquire them through trickery.17

sense.def: negatively be wily, shrewd, clever

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: "are the same, but their methods differ.

sense.def: look like; be similar in appearance

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.45; tr. Rickett 1998:307

tls:text.tls:line: arousing feelings of sadness in the hearts of men.

sense.def: sadness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:307f

tls:text.tls:line: both the worthy and the unworthy will be transformed by him.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:307f

tls:text.tls:line: Respect them and treat them well;

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: Even though the worthy are few,

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: if one employs the worthy,

sense.def: the N ones

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: how can the unworthy fail to change?

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: "It is said that the very rich cannot be employed

sense.def: (of a clan etc) be wealthy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: and the very poor know no shame.22

sense.def: the (proper) sense of what is publicly disgraceful, moral integrity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: When water is perfectly level, it will not flow.

sense.def: be level; be flat; be not too steep

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: When water is perfectly level, it will not flow.

sense.def: flow

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: to violate oaths and renege on agreements is to destroy one's credibility.24

sense.def: oath

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: to violate oaths and renege on agreements is to destroy one's credibility.24

sense.def: repudiate, go back on, deviate from[that word might fit better into another syn. group][CA]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308

tls:text.tls:line: Honoring one's ancestors

sense.def: deceased father (as represented in the temple); (dead father's tablet and temple); deceased father-in-law (Legge on Liji)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308f

tls:text.tls:line: A prince lacking in such virtues is nothing more than a bag of rotten meat.26

sense.def: SHI: sack

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.46; tr. Rickett 1998:308f

tls:text.tls:line: I would like to ask how it works."

sense.def: may I ask

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:309

tls:text.tls:line: then afterward achievements and fame will abound.

sense.def: achievements and fame; (justified) reputation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:309

tls:text.tls:line: The prince himself should be skilled in conducting affairs of state,

sense.def: in person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:309

tls:text.tls:line: that the hundred surnames will be free from disasters and disease,

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:309

tls:text.tls:line: These are the things the people like.

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:309

tls:text.tls:line: is something a true son of Heaven would not do.

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:310

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about the material wealth of the feudal lords?"

sense.def: may I ask about N

tls:text.tls:srcline:
吾君長來獵，
君長虎豹之皮；用

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.47; tr. Rickett 1998:310

tls:text.tls:line: Princes37 who prize the five grains value digging forks and plows. Those who like hunting38 value the skins of tigers and leopards.

sense.def: tiger- and leopard-like beasts; tigers and leopards

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: Never close the entrances to cinnabar mines

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: so that merchants and traders will not remain at home.

sense.def: merchants of all kinds 百工商賈

tls:text.tls:srcline:
此百姓之怠生，
百振而食，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: In this way the hundred surnames may spend their lives in comfort, full of vigor, and with plenty to eat.

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: This is not something they could do on their own.

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: those who are skilled in argument to be your spokesmen,

sense.def: those who are eloquent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: those who are skilled in argument to be your spokesmen,

sense.def: eloquently

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.48; tr. Rickett 1998:311

tls:text.tls:line: those who are skilled in argument to be your spokesmen,

sense.def: make elaborate formulations, make speeches; indulge in rhetoric;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:312

tls:text.tls:line: Change is excellent when it takes place at the proper time.

sense.def: be of excellent quality (as of soil etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:313

tls:text.tls:line: When opening the capital's gates,

sense.def: open (window, door, storehouse, eyes, mouth, document etc.)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:313

tls:text.tls:line: When opening the capital's gates,

sense.def: pre-Han usage: HF 6.1.16: (walled) capital city; capital or residence of a feudal lord;MENG: 遍國 throughout the capital

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.36; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:313f

tls:text.tls:line: Shift the burden of minor problems onto them

sense.def: harmful event

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.36; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:313f

tls:text.tls:line: This is so that matters will be handled correctly and you can concentrate on your inner feelings."

sense.def: real underlying attitude; innermost genuine feelings

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:314

tls:text.tls:line: "Should the capital's gates be closed

sense.def: pre-Han usage: HF 6.1.16: (walled) capital city; capital or residence of a feudal lord;MENG: 遍國 throughout the capital

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:314

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred surnames start raising a clamor,54

sense.def: the people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:314

tls:text.tls:line: "Select those whom Heaven55 protects,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 2.49; tr. Rickett 1998:314f

tls:text.tls:line: "Now," said the duke, "as a minister becomes more important,

sense.def: important, substantial; the most important 甚大

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:315

tls:text.tls:line: Even though he may encounter difficulties, he is certain to enjoy good fortune."

sense.def: there is/will be (supernaturally ordained) disaster

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:315

tls:text.tls:line: Even though he may encounter difficulties, he is certain to enjoy good fortune."

sense.def: be in good luck; turn out lucky

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:315

tls:text.tls:line: And consume large quantities of sweet wine in a luxurious manner.

sense.def: drink

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:315

tls:text.tls:line: This is because there will have been the promotion of essential production.

sense.def: be called (See COPULA, but note the deep difference between what people say and what ought to be said. The distinction between copula use and the present use must be reworked.CH)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: It means that profits will be irregular.

sense.def: means that, refers to the fact that, refers to S

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: For the hundred surnames, nothing is more precious.

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: For the hundred surnames, nothing is more precious.

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: They consider profit above all.

sense.def: important point; the important feature; the most important thing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: Both those on high and those below (at one point they go up, at another they go down?)

sense.def: go up

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: Both those on high and those below (at one point they go up, at another they go down?)

sense.def: go down, get down (from a contextually determinate place); dismount from a carriage

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
