tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: Once they circulate, goods can circulate.

sense.def: circulate; be exchanged (like goods)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.45; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:316

tls:text.tls:line: Select those of good reputation

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:317

tls:text.tls:line: "Putting members of the gentry first is the way to bring yourself harm.

sense.def: launch an attack against (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:317

tls:text.tls:line: Putting ordinary people last is the way to bring yourself disgrace. [??????]

sense.def: supply abundantly for (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 2.50; tr. Rickett 1998:317

tls:text.tls:line: this is to ignore a cardinal principle.

sense.def: leading thread, warp; cardinal principle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.50; ed. Dai Wang 2.51; tr. Rickett 1998:317

tls:text.tls:line: that people may scatter even after they have been dwelling together,

sense.def: mostly of persons, but occasionally also of things like insects: assemble

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不謹於附近而欲求遠者，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.51; tr. Rickett 1998:318

tls:text.tls:line: Those who pay no heed to people near at hand yet seek to attract73 those from afar

sense.def: be diligent about, pay painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.53; ed. Dai Wang 2.51; tr. Rickett 1998:318

tls:text.tls:line: If the ruler76 does not presume upon the masses but depends on his own efforts,

sense.def: rely upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.57; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: This is called having much but being poor."

sense.def: be properly called V; be said to V 可謂

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.58; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: to employ the poor,

sense.def: poor

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.58; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: construct highly elaborate grave sites

sense.def: beautify

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.58; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: construct highly elaborate grave sites

sense.def: dialect: mound with trees planted on it

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.58; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: use large coffins

sense.def: coffins of any kind (inner or outer); coffin system; coffins

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.60; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: "If you allow the various districts to have varying customs

sense.def: differ with respect to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.60; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: and the cities to have diverse rites,

sense.def: differ from each other as to (e.g. customs etc) see also 異乎

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.61; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: If people grow old in their own districts and sectionsī without ever communicating with outsiders,

sense.def: visit others ???

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.61; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: and permitting them to chant different hymns and praises while sacrificing to ancestors and spirits

sense.def: sing a song without musical accompaniment

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.61; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319

tls:text.tls:line: and permitting them to chant different hymns and praises while sacrificing to ancestors and spirits

sense.def: quietly chant poetry to oneself (as one goes); sing softly to oneself (as one goes)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.62; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319f

tls:text.tls:line: In mountains and river valleys

sense.def: large mountain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.62; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319f

tls:text.tls:line: In mountains and river valleys

sense.def: deep valley, ravine; valley with a stream in it

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.62; ed. Dai Wang 2.52; tr. Rickett 1998:319f

tls:text.tls:line: establish altars for the spirits so that people will be conscientious in sacrificing to them.

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.65; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:320

tls:text.tls:line: lord protectors are most concerned about individual accomplishments.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.65; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:320

sense.def: read qùshēng: put (oneself) last, treat oneself as the least honourable 自後

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.68; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321

tls:text.tls:line: when conducting sacrifices,

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.68; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321

tls:text.tls:line: From this we can know that exaggerating worthiness is of no advantage to the prince,

sense.def: occasionally in bamboo strip Warring States texts (Guodian, Ziyi): therefore

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: Those who exaggerate worthiness will perish;

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: Those who exaggerate worthiness will perish;

sense.def: lose out; be ruined, be annihilated, be ruined

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: those who make use of it will prosper.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: those who make use of it will prosper.

sense.def: thrive

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: Promote a sense of duty in order to prevent violence,

sense.def: righteous person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: Promote a sense of duty in order to prevent violence,

sense.def: prevent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.69; ed. Dai Wang 2.53; tr. Rickett 1998:321f

tls:text.tls:line: Promote a sense of duty in order to prevent violence,

sense.def: violent persons

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.70; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:322

tls:text.tls:line: Why not see him off?"

sense.def: send off

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.71; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:322

tls:text.tls:line: and asked her,

sense.def: ask the question S of interlocutor N 問N:

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.72; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:322

tls:text.tls:line: "A women should not be involved in a discussion about inviting feudal lords, [zhì???]

sense.def: women in general

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.72; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:322

tls:text.tls:line: "A women should not be involved in a discussion about inviting feudal lords, [zhì???]

sense.def: person (of a certain kind specified by preceding word) NB: current analyses take this as a suffix, but it is not clear that this is the proper way to take it.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.72; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:322

tls:text.tls:line: "A women should not be involved in a discussion about inviting feudal lords, [zhì???]

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.73; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.75; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: "how can one punish those who are insubordinate?"

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.76; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: When their forces were equal to his, they engaged him in battel;

sense.def: be the same; be equal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.76; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: When their forces were equal to his, they engaged him in battel;

sense.def: engage in battle, give battle; be professionally engaged in an act of warfare [NB: giving battle is not a vi2. The use of 戰 with two subjects is actually not very common.]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.76; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: when he assumed a defensive position, they attacked.

sense.def: launch an attack, undertake a military attack

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.76; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: His villages106 of a thousand households had no permanent structures,

sense.def: building; permanent structure to live in

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.77; ed. Dai Wang 2.54; tr. Rickett 1998:323

tls:text.tls:line: whoever occupies the throne will be unable to have any accomlishments or change the system.

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.78; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324

tls:text.tls:line: Do not expect rewards for the food presented in bags at the sacrifices.

sense.def: in bags; wrapped in bags

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.78; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324

tls:text.tls:line: Do not expect rewards for the food presented in bags at the sacrifices.

sense.def: SHI: bag, often made of leather, but sometimes also made of cloth; One type of tuó 橐 is constructed as a combination of two sacks with their openings close together, worn over one's shoulder. See illustration.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.79; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324

tls:text.tls:line: Sacrifices to the river gods111

sense.def: OBI: submerge; submerge and drown (OBI and also GUAN etc: in the process of sacrificing)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而民期為后，成形而更名則臨矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.80; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324

tls:text.tls:line: and the people will look forward to the future. Once this has come to pass114 and you have changed the names for things,115 you may then exercise control over the feudal lords."

sense.def: amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i1; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324f

tls:text.tls:line: this in itself will bring about a revolt."

sense.def: bring chaos upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i1; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324f

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about people who live on the borders

sense.def: may I ask about N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i1; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:324f

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about people who live on the borders

sense.def: border area of a state or of the empire

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i2; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:325

tls:text.tls:line: that men must hasten to respond in case of calamity, while women must prepare food.

sense.def: adult male

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i2; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:325

tls:text.tls:line: that men must hasten to respond in case of calamity, while women must prepare food.

sense.def: a woman (married or definitely of marriagable age i.e. above 15)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:325

tls:text.tls:line: but should merely communicate with their superiors

sense.def: interact with; cultivate contacts with (superiors, spirits); cultivate good diplomatic relations with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:325

tls:text.tls:line: Officials in charge of diplomatic affairs (xingren) should not be allowed to conduct private business.

sense.def: pursuit of private interests, private aims; selfish purposes; private selfishness; egotism

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 2.55; tr. Rickett 1998:325

tls:text.tls:line: Put those with ability in charge

sense.def: employ on a mission; send out as representative or ambassador; send as an emissary (to a place) (to do something)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.89; ed. Dai Wang 2.56; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: Do not give salaries to everyone lest you impoverish the country

sense.def: all the objects, everyone

tls:text.tls:srcline: 請問先合於天下而無私怨，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.89; ed. Dai Wang 2.56; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask," [said the duke], "how I may take the lead in uniting the empire without incurring selfish resentments,

sense.def: may I ask

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.91; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: If you put other people first and yourself last,

sense.def: read qùshēng: put (oneself) last, treat oneself as the least honourable 自後

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.91; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: then those bearing bags of presents will come from afar,128

sense.def: put in bag; carry in a bag

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.92; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: rather than giving them food,

sense.def: rice

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.92; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: I call this the way to avoid internal and external calamities.

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.92; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327

tls:text.tls:line: I call this the way to avoid internal and external calamities.

sense.def: be properly called V; be said to V 可謂

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.93; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327f

tls:text.tls:line: are the basis of the relationship between the prince and minister.

sense.def: interaction, relation; social intercourse; "interface!!"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.93; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:327f

tls:text.tls:line: parental love [love between relatives, surely]

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使君親之際同索，屬敬也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.94; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: What makes the relationships of princes and parents the same is that they depend on respect.

sense.def: interaction, relation; social intercourse; "interface!!"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.94; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: also depents on this kind of respectful relationship.

sense.def: interaction, relation; social intercourse; "interface!!"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.94; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: One must pay attention to this.

sense.def: should by all means be V-ed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.94; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: One must pay attention to this.

sense.def: be paid painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.95; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: people will congregate;

sense.def: gather in (a place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.95; ed. Dai Wang 2.57; tr. Rickett 1998:328

tls:text.tls:line: where the soil is fertile,

sense.def: be of excellent quality (as of soil etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.99; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: "The legal system and procedures and measurements

sense.def: the legal system

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.99; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: provide the norms and tools of kingship.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.100; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are humane

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.100; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are wise are skilled in capitalizing on change.

sense.def: the wise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.102; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: the second time, they are considered routine;

sense.def: do it again; come again; commit an act a second time

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.102; ed. Dai Wang 2.58; tr. Rickett 1998:329

tls:text.tls:line: but after a while

sense.def: after a long time; sometimes: for a long time

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Moving people from feudal estates140 to the markets

sense.def: move away; displace; dislocate; transplant (trees); transfer to different places

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Moving people from feudal estates140 to the markets

sense.def: to dislodge, to dislocate; to remove from its ordinary position; redirect (one's cart onto a different road)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: "Fish and turtles that will not take bait

sense.def: river turtle; sea turtle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: cannot be brought up from the depths.

sense.def: Northern speech: very deep pool; deep pond

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Trees that can survive frost and snow

sense.def: trees; trees of all kinds

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Trees that can survive frost and snow

sense.def: frozen dew or vapour, frost

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.105; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Trees that can survive frost and snow

sense.def: snow

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.106; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: Gentlemen who can take care of themselves

sense.def: govern (oneself) properly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.106; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330

tls:text.tls:line: have no need to follow sages.

sense.def: objey the rules or commands of (sages etc); side with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.107; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330f

tls:text.tls:line: Granting salaries and rewards without being selective in terms of the people involved

sense.def: be choosy about, be particular about the choice of 擇友

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.107; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330f

tls:text.tls:line: collecting people without being selective

sense.def: be choosy about, be particular about the choice of 擇友

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.107; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330f

tls:text.tls:line: If you pay attention to these two things

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.107; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:330f

tls:text.tls:line: If you pay attention to these two things

sense.def: set of two

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.109; ed. Dai Wang 2.59; tr. Rickett 1998:331

tls:text.tls:line: May I ask, after one has experimented a couple of times and the results are the same,

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.112; ed. Dai Wang 2.60; tr. Rickett 1998:332

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, those who would be king pay close attention to the solstices.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.112; ed. Dai Wang 2.60; tr. Rickett 1998:332

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, those who would be king pay close attention to the solstices.

sense.def: be diligent about, pay painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 2.60; tr. Rickett 1998:333

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask if forms change in accordance with the seasons?"

sense.def: may I ask

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.122; ed. Dai Wang 2.61; tr. Rickett 1998:335

tls:text.tls:line: and even thename of the state of Ying164 will be changed.

sense.def: get changed with the intention of improvement

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故天子之為國，圖具其樹物也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 35.01.124; ed. Dai Wang 2.61; tr. Rickett 1998:335f

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason the son of Heaven, in ruling his country, makes plans and preparations in accordance with the portents provided by plant and animal life."

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72 [STATEMENT V]

tls:text.tls:line: Should you fail to make a clean173 sweep,

sense.def: sweep away

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72 [STATEMENT V]

tls:text.tls:line: Should you fail to make a clean173 sweep,

sense.def: sweep away

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72 [STATEMENT V]

tls:text.tls:line: Should you fail to make a clean173 sweep,

sense.def: abolish; get rid of, weed out; remove; make clean, clear (a road); dismiss from office; have (someone) removed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VI]

tls:text.tls:line: All men desire wisdom,

sense.def: desire to be wise; desire to become wise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VI]

tls:text.tls:line: All men desire wisdom,

sense.def: be wise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VI]

tls:text.tls:line: but no one understand the means to obtain it.175

sense.def: search for (an admired object); aim for (a desirable situation); seek out (appropriate candidates for a job); seek and find

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VI]

tls:text.tls:line: but no one understand the means to obtain it.175

sense.def: be wise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VI]

tls:text.tls:line: Cast it beyond the seas to avoid becoming its captive.

sense.def: cast the object N1 in the the place N2; throw N1 before N2

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.62; tr. Rickett 1998:72, [STATEMENT VII]

tls:text.tls:line: What transforms and nourishes all things is called the Power.178

sense.def: transform and nourish properly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:73[STATEMENT XIII]

tls:text.tls:line: Cleanse the mansion of your mind

sense.def: purify

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:73[STATEMENT XIII]

tls:text.tls:line: the Spirit will appear.

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:73, [STATEMENT XIV]

tls:text.tls:line: remain quiescent toward them, and they will put themselves in order.

sense.def: govern (oneself) properly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:73, [STATEMENT XIV]

tls:text.tls:line: wisdom cannot plan for every exigency.

sense.def: wisdom; BUDDH: perfect insight, wisdom skr. prajñā

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, the man of quality is not to be enticed186 by something he likes

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, the man of quality is not to be enticed186 by something he likes

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: nor oppressed by what he dislikes.

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: He is contented and nonassertive,

sense.def: be at ease and happy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: rejecting wisdom and pretense.187

sense.def: wisdom (as something to be rejected because insufficient)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: rejecting wisdom and pretense.187

sense.def: and 衛侯逐公叔戍與其黨，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: rejecting wisdom and pretense.187

sense.def: reasoning, rationality???

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XIX]

tls:text.tls:line: Mistakes are inherent in relying on one's own opinions.

sense.def: deploy (oneself) in tasks that need to be done

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:74, [STATEMENT XIX]

tls:text.tls:line: Crimes are inherent in forcing change.

sense.def: making changes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.63; tr. Rickett 1998:75, [EXPLANATION II]

tls:text.tls:line: These two statements mean that you should not try to preempt the ability of others

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.64; tr. Rickett 1998:76

tls:text.tls:line: Now, if the hall is not opened up and cleaned out,

sense.def: be cleaned properly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.64; tr. Rickett 1998:77

tls:text.tls:line: and so those who talk about them treat them as the same.

sense.def: make the relevant distinction between contextually determinate things

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 2.64; tr. Rickett 1998:78 [EXPLANATION IX]

tls:text.tls:line: so that people will have to act as they should.

sense.def: will certainly; willy nilly have to; inevitably will; certainly would have

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 2.64; tr. Rickett 1998:78 [EXPLANATION IX]

tls:text.tls:line: Affairs204 are supervised by the law.

sense.def: be supervised by

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:78, [EXPLANATION X]

tls:text.tls:line: but no one knows its limits.

sense.def: no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.39; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:78, [EXPLANATION XI]

tls:text.tls:line: one has no preconceptions.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:78f, [EXPLANATION XII]

tls:text.tls:line: Being vacuous, it is not to be bent.

sense.def: be bent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79, [EXPLANATION XIII]

tls:text.tls:line: The mind

sense.def: mind (Most of these examples are really nab(post-N) or nab[post-N]. The subdivision has not been implemented so far.)BUDDH: skr. citta (the concept of 心 in Buddhist texts is extremely complicated!)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79, [EXPLANATION XIII]

tls:text.tls:line: is the dwelling place of wisdom.

sense.def: intellect; intellectual competence, professional competence; intelligence, intellectual capacity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79, [EXPLANATION XIII]

tls:text.tls:line: is the dwelling place of wisdom.

sense.def: (abstract:) abode, dwelling place

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79

tls:text.tls:line: he who cleanses the mansion

sense.def: purify

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.46; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79 [EXPLANATION XV]

tls:text.tls:line: This means that the namé11 must not exceed its reality,

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.46; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:79 [EXPLANATION XV]

tls:text.tls:line: One must examine closely the spoken word and rectify names.

sense.def: survey, assess and administrate; supervise and scrutinise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.50; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XVII]

tls:text.tls:line: Since ordinary men may be oppressed by what they dislike,

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: nor oppressed by what he dislikes."

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the statement calls him "a man of quality."

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the statement calls him "a man of quality."

sense.def: be at ease and happy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: "He is contented and nonassertive, rejecting wisdom and pretense"

sense.def: wisdom (as something to be rejected because insufficient)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: "He is contented and nonassertive, rejecting wisdom and pretense"

sense.def: reasoning, rationality???

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XVIII]

tls:text.tls:line: mean that he relies on things as they are.

sense.def: this (aforementioned utterance, or quotation)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XVIII]

tls:text.tls:line: means to take things rather than oneself as the norm.

sense.def: discard (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XVIII]

tls:text.tls:line: means to take things rather than oneself as the norm.

sense.def: his own [thing/interests]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 2.65; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XVIII]

tls:text.tls:line: means to take things rather than oneself as the norm.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.53; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XIX]

tls:text.tls:line: "Mistakes are inherent in relying on one's own opinions.

sense.def: deploy (oneself) in tasks that need to be done

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.53; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:80, [EXPLANATION XIX]

tls:text.tls:line: Crimes are inherent in forcing change."

sense.def: making changes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.54; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:80

tls:text.tls:line: "The prince who adheres to the Way,214 when at rest, appears to lack knowledge"

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 36.01.55; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:80f

tls:text.tls:line: means that he has returned to a state of vacuity.

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ART OF THE MIND, PART II, GUAN 37.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:58f

tls:text.tls:line: Then all things may be fully comprehended.

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ART OF THE MIND, PART II, GUAN 37.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:58f

tls:text.tls:line: As though arriving on the wings of a bird,217 this naturally comes about.218

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:59

tls:text.tls:line: No one understands the Spirit's supreme nature,

sense.def: no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:59

tls:text.tls:line: This is called inner Power.220

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:59

tls:text.tls:line: If what fills the self is not good,

sense.def: be honourable, be admirable

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:59f

tls:text.tls:line: so the world will be well regulated.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:60

tls:text.tls:line: can you find it within yourself?225

sense.def: contrastive: oneself, by oneself[PERVASIVELY DIFFICULT TO DISTINGUISH FROM THE "PERSONALLY npro.adV"] Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:60

tls:text.tls:line: can you find it within yourself?225

sense.def: find N1 in (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.66; tr. Rickett 1998:60

tls:text.tls:line: can you find it within yourself?225

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:60

tls:text.tls:line: What is at one with affairs and is able to bring about changes in them is called wisdom.

sense.def: wisdom; BUDDH: perfect insight, wisdom skr. prajñā

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:60f

tls:text.tls:line: Only the man of quality who grasps the One is able to do this.228

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: The sage makes decisions regarding things

sense.def: decide

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: His mind being well regulated,

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred surnames will then become well regulated.

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: When the people are restrained

sense.def: population; the people in general

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred surnames are well regulated,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:61

tls:text.tls:line: It is ever so that a regulatory system that depends on officials administering its regulations

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.67; tr. Rickett 1998:62

tls:text.tls:line: he daily renews his Power.

sense.def: renew, make new (i.e. redo what existed before, NOT: create something new)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:63

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient times, the illustrious kings loved the world.

sense.def: the enlightened kings (of the Xia etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:63

tls:text.tls:line: is certain to be because of joy and happiness, sadness and anger.

sense.def: happy overt joy (typically with regard to something)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:63

tls:text.tls:line: is certain to be because of joy and happiness, sadness and anger.

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:63

tls:text.tls:line: Now, what is accumulated within acts as a fountainhead.244

sense.def: to become assembled; to become dense and abundant (of population);

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 37.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:63f

tls:text.tls:line: the four limbs will remain strong and firm,

sense.def: be strong and firm

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: Unless others lead, he does not seek for harmony.

sense.def: lead the singing > take the lead; initiate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: The sage goes back to the beginning to gauge the reality of things

sense.def: assess precisely by calculation; assess precisely as if by calculation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: he examines their basic nature.

sense.def: inquire into, try to find out about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: [When he comes to understands the basic images of things then he goes on to investigate their form.]

sense.def: trace to its details and principles, investigate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: he comes to understand their inner reality.

sense.def: inquire into, try to find out about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: he comes to understand their inner reality.

sense.def: psychological basis (see also FEELING); basic elements; basic point made; basic orientation; point of view, approach; basic motives

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: Of those things about which people worry

sense.def: need urgently; be preoccupied by the need of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: none are more pressing than water and fire.

sense.def: be more urgently needed than

tls:text.tls:srcline: 明君聖人亦不為一人枉其法。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: The sagé53 [The enlightened ruler as well as the sage THIS IS THE POINT CH] does not bend his laws for anyone.

sense.def: enlightened ruler

tls:text.tls:srcline: 明君聖人亦不為一人枉其法。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86

tls:text.tls:line: The sagé53 [The enlightened ruler as well as the sage THIS IS THE POINT CH] does not bend his laws for anyone.

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred surnames are benefited.

sense.def: enjoy, derive profit from (benefits)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: Remains quiescent while waiting for things.

sense.def: make peaceful; calm (the mind)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: Remains quiescent while waiting for things.

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: Remains quiescent while waiting for things.

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: When things arrive he assigns names to them.255

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.68; tr. Rickett 1998:86f

tls:text.tls:line: When things arrive he assigns names to them.255

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.03.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.69; tr. Rickett 1998:88

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are weak but arrogant hasten towards death and ruin.

sense.def: death

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 88

tls:text.tls:line: This is what we call the Way.

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 88

tls:text.tls:line: This is what we call the Way.

sense.def: be called (See COPULA, but note the deep difference between what people say and what ought to be said. The distinction between copula use and the present use must be reworked.CH)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 88f

tls:text.tls:line: and he himself will be unable to avoid great harm.266

sense.def: avoid; escape from (something); keep away from (somebody)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 88f

sense.def: 自己把自己 preposed object: oneself as the object, 自殺"kill oneself" Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 88f

sense.def: injure (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 89

tls:text.tls:line: yet he is skilled in foretelling good and bad fortune.267

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 89f

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that is able to establish order while not establishing order?

sense.def: how 庸知

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 89f

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that is able to grasp what lies within this mean?

sense.def: earnestness; sincerity of the heart; moral sincerity; moral earnestness;; moral seriousness; a moral sense

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that can reject fame and success

sense.def: whoever? i.e. no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that can reject success and fame

sense.def: who? i.e. no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: Those with no real accomplishments honour having accomplishments.274

sense.def: achievements

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that can make himself forget himself,275

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that can make himself forget himself,275

sense.def: the Self

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.05.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90

tls:text.tls:line: To follow Heaven and Earth's guiding principle?

sense.def: HF 8.1.15: emulate (the sage); imitate; live up to; act according to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90f

tls:text.tls:line: Unswayed, he waits.

sense.def: treat, meet, deal with, have contact with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90f

tls:text.tls:line: Unswayed, he waits.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90f

tls:text.tls:line: Devoid of preconceptions, he never divides his attention.

sense.def: be all receptive 空然

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90f

tls:text.tls:line: Devoid of preconceptions, he never divides his attention.

sense.def: divide or spread in two directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 90f

tls:text.tls:line: Qietly, he clears his mind.

sense.def: purify (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: He does not merely take the word of those beside him that undertakings have been completed.

sense.def: those who are close to and beside

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: refusing to listen to specious arguments.

sense.def: discursive argumentation; acts of eloquence and argumentation; especially: specious argumentation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.70; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: and the good and the bad both show themselves.

sense.def: show (oneself) to N2

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.71; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: Something always suspends or supports them.

sense.def: support; bear, bear up under

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.71; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: Since a drum is unable to activate itself

sense.def: activate (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.07.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.71; tr. Rickett 1998: 91

tls:text.tls:line: It is collected in the muscles and flesh279

sense.def: be assembled, take proper shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.07.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.71; tr. Rickett 1998: 91f

tls:text.tls:line: But no one can tell when.

sense.def: no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.08.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 92

tls:text.tls:line: never indulged in meaningless flapping,

sense.def: insubstantial, inconsequential; rarified; vacant; also generally: empty; characterised by emptiness 虛月 "months where they are empty"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.08.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 92

tls:text.tls:line: Nor did their hands indulge in the meaningless pointing of a brush.2ì

sense.def: insubstantial, inconsequential; rarified; vacant; also generally: empty; characterised by emptiness 虛月 "months where they are empty"

tls:text.tls:line: For when doing poorly,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.10.01; ed. Dai Wang 22.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 93f

tls:text.tls:line: others will naturally gravitate.

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 22.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 94

tls:text.tls:line: Knowing oneself means to be restrained.

sense.def: understand (oneself); know where one is;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 94f

tls:text.tls:line: Now when a son takes the place of his father, he is said to be righteous

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 94f

tls:text.tls:line: when a minister takes the place of his prince he is said to be rebellious.290

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 94f

tls:text.tls:line: King Wu was an example of this.291

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 95

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that is able to dispense with bickering and trickery

sense.def: convincing eloquence; rhetoric; rhetorical polish; rhetorical skill

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 95

tls:text.tls:line: With men who are arrogant and domineering,

sense.def: arrogant and over-confident 驕君 "arrogant ruler"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 95

tls:text.tls:line: With men who are arrogant and domineering,

sense.def: arrogant; impolitely informal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.11.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.72; tr. Rickett 1998: 95

tls:text.tls:line: With men who are arrogant and domineering,

sense.def: arrogant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.12.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.73; tr. Rickett 1998: 96f

tls:text.tls:line: Should you wish to suppress [your personal qualities],

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.12.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.73; tr. Rickett 1998: 97

tls:text.tls:line: But no one can tell when this will be.

sense.def: no one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 38.12.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.73; tr. Rickett 1998: 97

tls:text.tls:line: "My words are like the quintessence of the Great Brilliance.304

sense.def: tell addresse N1 about subject N2 語之故 "tell him the reason"

tls:text.tls:srcline:
美惡、
賢不肖、愚俊之所生也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: WATER AND EARTH, GUAN 39.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 100

tls:text.tls:line: Beauty and ugliness, worthiness and unworthiness, stupidity and giftedness all spring from it.

sense.def: heroic talent, outstanding talent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: There is no place into which it will not flow,

sense.def: all objects =無所不

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: There is no place into which it will not flow,

sense.def: flow in (a direction); flow over a surface

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: Men all rush upward;

sense.def: rush in the direction of; hurry to catch up with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: Men all rush upward;

sense.def: that which is high; the high thing; high point, elevation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: it alone rushes downward.

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: it alone rushes downward.

sense.def: what is low in the terrain; what is below one

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: and the instrument of kingliness,

sense.def: the true king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: Neutral taste

sense.def: tastelessness, neutral taste; the realm of tastelessness/insipidity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason water is the level for all things,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101f

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason there is no place it does not fill, no place it does not occupy.

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.74; tr. Rickett 1998: 101f

tls:text.tls:line: produced from metal and stone,

sense.def: be produced from

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: their bodies become fat and large,

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: their feathers and fur rich and luxuriant,

sense.def: feathers

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: their feathers and fur rich and luxuriant,

sense.def: feathers and fur

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: their feathers and fur rich and luxuriant,

sense.def: fur garments 冬日衣皮毛

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: their feathers and fur rich and luxuriant,

sense.def: be abundant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: Its freshness and unsulliedness

sense.def: be fresh, pure, and new, unstale

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102

tls:text.tls:line: Its freshness and unsulliedness

sense.def: be dirty

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102f

tls:text.tls:line: When struck,

sense.def: knock at; strike against so as to make a sound

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102f

tls:text.tls:line: and cut it in two to make tallies and tokens.

sense.def: split; cut open (a heart etc); have cut open (one's back)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102f

tls:text.tls:line: and cut it in two to make tallies and tokens.

sense.def: tally, symbol of a contractual obligation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 102f

tls:text.tls:line: and cut it in two to make tallies and tokens.

sense.def: SHU, yaodian 18: auspicious insignia of rank

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 103

tls:text.tls:line: the kidneys produce the brain,

sense.def: brain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 103f

tls:text.tls:line: The spleen develops to form the nose,

sense.def: nose

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104

tls:text.tls:line: In this way, if water collects as jade,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104

tls:text.tls:line: In this way, if water collects as jade,

sense.def: be assembled, take proper shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104f

tls:text.tls:line: Things that hide in dark recesses and are able both to appear and to disappear

sense.def: hide in; crouch on (the ground etc) 伏地

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104f

tls:text.tls:line: Things that hide in dark recesses and are able both to appear and to disappear

sense.def: state of darkness, state of darkness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104f

tls:text.tls:line: are the ancient tortoise and dragon.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104f

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it can foretell all things

sense.def: for this reason, and thus, and so

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.75; tr. Rickett 1998: 104f

tls:text.tls:line: but travels around wearing the colors.

sense.def: read pī: wear (cloth); bear (shield etc); abstractly, occasionally: bear (a bad name etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: It transforms itself without regard for the day;

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: The tortoise and dragon are things that hide in dark recesses and are able to appear or disappear.

sense.def: state of darkness, state of darkness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: arě34 the wei and qingji.

sense.def: a kind of mystical animal which lives in the water and has the appearance of a snake (YUPIAN; see WANGLI: 1180)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: whose banks have not shifted,

sense.def: move house; move place, move about, move around; change course; migrate; move abroad

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: appearance is like that of a man,

sense.def: external appearance, form

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105

tls:text.tls:line: holds aloft a yellow umbrella,

sense.def: baldachin of a carriage; chariot canopy; umbrella

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105f

tls:text.tls:line: The wei has one head and two bodies,

sense.def: head (also of birds etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 105f

tls:text.tls:line: The wei has one head and two bodies,

sense.def: have two, contain two

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the fineness or coarseness and mixing or congealing of water

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: Those things that hide in dark recesses and are both able to appear and disappear340

sense.def: state of darkness, state of darkness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: Now everyone consumes water,

sense.def: eat or imbibe for a purpose

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: Everyone possesses it,

tls:text.tls:line: but Guanzi alone made use of it.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: It is water.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: is water.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

sense.def: living being (often clearly including humans, but frequently indistinguishable from the examples collected under ANIMAL)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
美惡、
賢不肖、愚俊之所產也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

tls:text.tls:line: It is that from which beauty and uglines, worthiness and unworthiness, stupidity and giftedness are produced.

sense.def: be made to bud forth; be reared, be bred; be produced 屈產之乘 "teams of horses bred in Qū"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106

sense.def: coarse and vulgar; be uncouth

tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 106f

sense.def: be stupid; be simple-minded; be incompetent

sense.def: get mixed in; CC20: mixed; CC242: mixed (colour); CC279 mixed (and confused/chaotic); CC 350, LIJI 1.40: (men and women sitting) mixed together

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore its people are flattering and deceitful,

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 107

sense.def: be wicked and shrewd

tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 107

tls:text.tls:line: cunning and profit seeking.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 39.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.76; tr. Rickett 1998: 107

sense.def: be quite stupid, be distinctly stupid

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore its people are stupid, idiotic, and given to divination.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 111

tls:text.tls:line: offering earnest prayers to those whose altars have been damaged and whose sacrifices havebeen interrupted,

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 111

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 111

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 111f

tls:text.tls:line: This is due to the inherent power of the stars.

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 111f

sense.def: be called (See COPULA, but note the deep difference between what people say and what ought to be said. The distinction between copula use and the present use must be reworked.CH)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.78; tr. Rickett 1998: 112

tls:text.tls:srcline:
三政曰：
令禁扇去笠，
毋扱免，

令禁扇去笠，
毋扱免，

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113f

tls:text.tls:srcline:
三政曰：
令禁扇去笠，
毋扱免，

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113f

sense.def: a large hat to protect against sun and rain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113f

tls:text.tls:line: and to clean out wells that are clogged and subject to the runoff from rain water, and field hovels.

sense.def: hut; simple hut (often built next to a tomb to house the mourner during the mourning period)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
五政曰：
令禁罝設禽獸，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113f

sense.def: wild animals generally (not necessarily including both birds and beasts) 禽獸之皮

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113f

tls:text.tls:line: and the killing of flying birds.

sense.def: birds in general; birds of any kind; a bird

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113

tls:text.tls:line: In every respect, it aids the four seasons

sense.def: to help; be of use to; to support (normally rulers, but occasionally wicked persons or practices); to assist (the exercise of proper government)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113

tls:text.tls:line: The five grains then become ripe,363

sense.def: reach the limit > ripen (of grain) ??

tls:text.tls:line: the nation prospers,

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 113

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 114

tls:text.tls:line: restrict petty disputes,

sense.def: constrain, restrain, contain; hold back; defend onself against

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 114

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.79; tr. Rickett 1998: 114f

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 115

五政曰：
禁遷徙，
止流民，圉分異。

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 115

tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the sage kings paid attention to the seasons as the basis of their government,

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故聖王務時而寄政焉，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the sage kings paid attention to the seasons as the basis of their government,

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此三者聖王所以合於天地之行也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: These three were the ways in which the sage kings maintained harmony with the movements of Heaven and Earth.

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: "The sun controls the Yang

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: and the moon controls the Yin.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: The stars control harmony.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此四者，聖王所以免於天地之誅也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.80; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: These four were the ways in which the sage kings avoided the punishments of Heaven and Earth.

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 116

tls:text.tls:line: The Power produces worthy men.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 116f

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the sage kings, in bringing good order to the world,

sense.def: the sage kings

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.36; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 117

tls:text.tls:line: and there are certain to be great calamities.

sense.def: major disaster; hardship; misfortune; calamity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 40.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 117

tls:text.tls:line: And the three foundations of government will be carried out and augmented."

sense.def: be supported; be helped

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: FIVE PHASES, GUAN 41.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 121
