tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 121

tls:text.tls:line: the five bureaus (wu guan) being in accord with the six treasuries (liu fu),3ì

sense.def: official duties; bureau; 五官 "five bureaus"; office, official position NB: the distinction between the offices as such and their holders is blurred for very good reasons, since officials acted as representatives of their bureau.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 121

tls:text.tls:line: and the five musical notes (wu sheng) being in accord with the six Yang pitch pipes (liu l).385

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 121f

tls:text.tls:line: and bring them under unified control.

sense.def: put under one's single-handed control

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.i1; tr. Rickett 1998: 121f

tls:text.tls:line: one may become an enlightened son of Heaven.387

sense.def: be the Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 122

tls:text.tls:line: once it is constant, make it your inflexible rule.

sense.def: leading thread, warp; cardinal principle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: Hence there is no need to seek out the spirits by casting straws of the milfoil393

sense.def: be magically efficatious, be supernaturally efficacious; show one's supernatural talents and effectiveness

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昔者黃帝得蚩尤而明於天道，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient times, Huang Di obtained Chiyou to examine the way of Heaven

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: and Taichang to investigate the benefits of Earth.396 [so he gained a proper understanding...]

sense.def: have a reasoned understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: He obtained Canglong397 to study the East,

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: Zhurong to study the South,

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: Taifeng to study the West,

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123

tls:text.tls:line: and Houtu to study the North.398

sense.def: understand properly; develop a proper understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 123f

tls:text.tls:line: throughout the empire.400

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: established the five musical notes

sense.def: set up, originate (something), create, invent; produce; of texts: compose

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.i2; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: established the five musical notes

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 2.83; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: The five notes being harmonized,

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 2.83; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: and the five bureaus in order to regulate the positions of men.

sense.def: official duties; bureau; 五官 "five bureaus"; office, official position NB: the distinction between the offices as such and their holders is blurred for very good reasons, since officials acted as representatives of their bureau.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 124

tls:text.tls:line: He summarizes and identified the various ranks and titles

sense.def: mark out as N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Do not let the larvae of hybernating insects mature, but let water chestnuts sprout.406

sense.def: hibernating

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Do not let the larvae of hybernating insects mature, but let water chestnuts sprout.406

sense.def: water chestnut

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Make sure sprouts have sufficient soil around their roots.

sense.def: grain before it has grown ears; sprouts, young plants

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Do not kill fledglings

sense.def: kill; destroy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Do not kill fledglings

sense.def: young bird, fledgling needing parental care

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: Do not kill fledglings

sense.def: fledgling; new-born nestling who has just emerged from the egg

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: or harm young deer.

sense.def: fawn, young deer

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: to avoid harming infants still wrapped in swaddling clothes.

sense.def: small blanket for babies (also written with silk radical for garment radical, and indeed without any radical)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: and gentlemen travel about on swift horses in order to stimulate the vital force of earth.

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: People will not suffer from illness, and things will blossom in great profusion.

sense.def: be in a flourishing state

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: People will not suffer from illness, and things will blossom in great profusion.

sense.def: to blossom, to be in bloom

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: People will not suffer from illness, and things will blossom in great profusion.

sense.def: grow profusely

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125

tls:text.tls:line: On the seventy-second day, this period comes to and end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 125f

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: and whether or not gentlemen stay quietly at home

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: so that the farmers can pursue their efforts to the maximum degree.

sense.def: farmer; peasant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: and the five grains will ripen in abundance with large kernels.

sense.def: flower

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.i3; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: On the seventh-second day this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: commanding the officer in charge of sacrifices (zhuzhong) to select suitable animals and birds from their pens

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: Ghosts and spirits will absorb their vital force,

sense.def: ghost or spirit of any kind 狀似鬼神； 鬼神無形體

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: while gentlemen enjoy their taste.

sense.def: members of the ruling class; men of superior rank 君子食其味焉

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: while gentlemen enjoy their taste.

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: Thereafter, the cold winds arrive,

sense.def: refreshingly cool; cold

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: the white dew falls,

sense.def: white; of swords: blank, i.e. drawn; derived nominal usage

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: the white dew falls,

sense.def: dew

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: and the son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: to prepare armor, sharpen weapons,

sense.def: sharpen (knives/weapons)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 合什為伍，以修於四境之內，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: bring together the groups of ten (shi), and form the squads of five (wu) in order to make preparations everywhere within the four borders.

sense.def: a group of ten persons or items

tls:text.tls:srcline: 合什為伍，以修於四境之內，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: bring together the groups of ten (shi), and form the squads of five (wu) in order to make preparations everywhere within the four borders.

sense.def: army unit (not necessarily consisting of five persons)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: Thereafter, during the day it is very warm,

sense.def: during the daytime

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: the harvest is rich,

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 126

tls:text.tls:line: On the seventy-second day, this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: The son of Heaven issues orders

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: He orders the people to go out to hunt animals and birds.

sense.def: hunt

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: He orders the people to go out to hunt animals and birds.

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: If the son of Heaven during this period does not distribute stores418

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: then their eldest sons will die.

sense.def: eldest 長子 "eldest son"; most senior

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127

tls:text.tls:line: After seventy-two days this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127f

tls:text.tls:line: If the son of Heaven engages in too many undertakings and is hasty in dealing with his government,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 127f

tls:text.tls:line: After seventy-two days this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: If the son of Heaven builds palaces

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: and constructs pavilions,419

sense.def: build with earth [SHI]; build from scratch, erect

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: and constructs pavilions,419

sense.def: terrace; square platform built on an earth-mound, raised platform 高臺

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: and constructs pavilions,419

sense.def: GY 17.5: wooden platform with pavilion, sometimes for military uses; later often overlooking the sea; building on a platform

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: After seventy-two days this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: If the son of Heaven attacks mountains and breaks stones420

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 2.i4; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: After seventy-two days this period comes to an end.

sense.def: come to an end, be finished; be over with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: If the son of Heaven breaks dams or changes the course of large rivers,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: those with hair and wombs will miscarry,

sense.def: be viviparous; have a womb

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: and the roots of plants and trees will rot.

sense.def: roots

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 41.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998: 128

tls:text.tls:line: and the roots of plants and trees will rot.

sense.def: commendable, excellent; of high quality, in excellent condition

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON PAYING ATTENTION TO CIRCUMSTANCES, GUAN 42.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998:130

tls:text.tls:line: means that one's courage will vanish.

sense.def: fighting spirit

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998:131

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it is said:"Those who avoid arbitrary behavior become supreme."

sense.def: cultivate or practise non-assertive action

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998:131

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it is said:"Those who avoid arbitrary behavior become supreme."

sense.def: become a Sovereign, achieve sovereign power

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.85; tr. Rickett 1998:131

tls:text.tls:line: When opposition has just begun to develop,426

sense.def: new twigs with sprouts

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:132f

tls:text.tls:line: Expanding and contracting in accordance with the Yin and the Yang is the most precious.

sense.def: expand

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:132f

tls:text.tls:line: Expanding and contracting in accordance with the Yin and the Yang is the most precious.

sense.def: to shrink; contract; shrivel (as skin in old people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:132f

tls:text.tls:line: Expanding and contracting in accordance with the Yin and the Yang is the most precious.

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: await their commands, and then take action.

sense.def: begin to take action

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the worthy ruler is honest and trustworthy in being humane.

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the worthy ruler is honest and trustworthy in being humane.

sense.def: show kind-heartedness towards, treat with kindness, be kind to; be lenient towards

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: He is compassionate and kind in expressing his love.

sense.def: be loving and generous (typically as a superior)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: He is calm within and never unstable, generous in his benevolence and lacking in personal desires.

sense.def: be generous in respect to

tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133

tls:text.tls:line: peace, quiet, and happiness.

sense.def: conduct a happy life

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the worthy ruler, calm and unhurried, remains perfectly quiescent.

sense.def: abstractly: the man of talent and moral worth (at any time and in any place)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the worthy ruler, calm and unhurried, remains perfectly quiescent.

sense.def: be at peace and secure, be safe; be at ease; find peace; be poised

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.86; tr. Rickett 1998:133f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the worthy ruler, calm and unhurried, remains perfectly quiescent.

sense.def: be slow and comfortable; be mild

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 42.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:134

sense.def: below

tls:text.tls:line: To be like the four seasons in their constancy,

sense.def: season; periods of time as defined by the official calendar

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

tls:text.tls:line: like the stars and planets in their unfallibility,446

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

sense.def: night

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

tls:text.tls:line: To be like night, to be like day,

sense.def: daytime, daylight

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

tls:text.tls:line: To be like the sun and moon in their clarity

sense.def: sun

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

tls:text.tls:line: To be like the sun and moon in their clarity

sense.def: the moon

tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.87; tr. Rickett 1998:137

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:137f

tls:text.tls:line: be certain to transform your own bad habits first.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:137f

tls:text.tls:line: be certain to transform your own bad habits first.

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:138

tls:text.tls:line: such that they are capable of daily renewal?

sense.def: be renewed 日新 find new ways

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:138f

tls:text.tls:line: so that they correspond to reality, this in itself will bring deception to a halt.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 43.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:138f

tls:text.tls:line: you will be elevated to assist the son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: is that their country is the site of their family tombs

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: is that their country is the site of their family tombs

sense.def: tombs

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則州縣鄉黨與宗族足懷樂也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they are sufficiently happy in their regions (zhou), outer districts (xian), districts (xiang), leagues (dang), and clan settlements (zong zu).455

sense.def: region

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則州縣鄉黨與宗族足懷樂也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they are sufficiently happy in their regions (zhou), outer districts (xian), districts (xiang), leagues (dang), and clan settlements (zong zu).455

sense.def: administrative district

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則州縣鄉黨與宗族足懷樂也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they are sufficiently happy in their regions (zhou), outer districts (xian), districts (xiang), leagues (dang), and clan settlements (zong zu).455

sense.def: district of 12 500 families

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則州縣鄉黨與宗族足懷樂也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they are sufficiently happy in their regions (zhou), outer districts (xian), districts (xiang), leagues (dang), and clan settlements (zong zu).455

sense.def: village of 500 families (Zheng Xuan ad LY 9.2)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則州縣鄉黨與宗族足懷樂也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.88; tr. Rickett 1998:141 THE NINE ALTERNATIVES

tls:text.tls:line: it is because they are sufficiently happy in their regions (zhou), outer districts (xian), districts (xiang), leagues (dang), and clan settlements (zong zu).455

sense.def: clan territories

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:142

tls:text.tls:line: while seeking to be well-informed,

sense.def: intellect; intellectual competence, professional competence; intelligence, intellectual capacity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 44.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:142

tls:text.tls:line: 帨hese are three manifestations of stupidity (san an) in regard to military affairs.457

sense.def: dumbness of mind; stupidity; state of obfuscation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RELIANCE ON LAW, GUAN 45.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: Afterward, he may take his ease, yet the empire will be well governed.

sense.def: be at leisure; make oneself comfortable; be at ease

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RELIANCE ON LAW, GUAN 45.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: Afterward, he may take his ease, yet the empire will be well governed.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RELIANCE ON LAW, GUAN 45.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: The prince who is doomed to failure is not like this.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: but the hundred surnames are simply confused,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: but the hundred surnames are simply confused,

sense.def: be all confused

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: and the state is not well governed.

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: The sage prince is not like this.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: Since he maintais the importance of the principles of rulership,

sense.def: the vital point; most important point. essential point; essence; main initiative; main controlling functions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: he can take his ease and be happy,

sense.def: easy happiness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: ride fast horses and engaged in the hunt,

sense.def: gallop along, race along

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144

tls:text.tls:line: The joy within the palace

sense.def: joyful satisfaction; state of delight or happiness; joyfulness; joy, delight; happiness;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: He treats his body well,

sense.def: body

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: makes himself comfortable,

sense.def: body

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: makes himself comfortable,

sense.def: physical frame

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: He lets fall his robes and folds his hands, yet the empore is well governed.458

sense.def: fold hands respectfully in the Chinese fashion as a sign of respect; fold hands (and do nothing)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: He lets fall his robes and folds his hands, yet the empore is well governed.458

sense.def: have one's hands folded and hanging low in front of one's stomach> be inactive

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:144f

tls:text.tls:line: He lets fall his robes and folds his hands, yet the empore is well governed.458

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.89; tr. Rickett 1998:145

tls:text.tls:line: his stores are automatically plentiful,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:145

tls:text.tls:line: and making his people feel at ease with his laws.

sense.def: follow naturally, obey in an unforced way (the law etc) 安法

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:145f

tls:text.tls:line: "If the laws of a country are inconsistent,

sense.def: be united, be unified, be made consistent 不可一

tls:text.tls:srcline:
民不道法，
則不祥；
國更立法以典民，則不祥；

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:145f

tls:text.tls:line: Such will also be the case if his people do not obey the law, if his country changes its established laws to control its people,464

sense.def: (VERB) another (OBJECT) 更立法 "establish other laws"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: It is the determining factor as to whether one survives or perishes, has order or chaos.

sense.def: existence or otherwise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: It is the determining factor as to whether one survives or perishes, has order or chaos.

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: It is the determining factor as to whether one survives or perishes, has order or chaos.

sense.def: from

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: the positions of the prince and ministers, superoir and inferior, the high and the low, all being derived from it."

sense.def: relative status; dimension of status

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: It also banned extraordinary service [clothes!]

sense.def: tremendous; extraordinary

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: and deviant behavior.468

sense.def: deviant, strange and inappropriate; irregular

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, two things were taken as constants by enlightened kings:

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: The second was to prohibit people from pursuing private interests so that they might be restrained and employed.

sense.def: be selfish; be directed towards selfish ends; pursue selfish aims

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: These two

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146

tls:text.tls:line: Pursuing private interests

sense.def: pursuit of private interests, private aims; selfish purposes; private selfishness; egotism

tls:text.tls:srcline: 眾彊富貴私勇者不能侵也，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146f

tls:text.tls:line: while those who had large followings and were strong, those who were rich or high in status, and those who possessed their own warriors were unable to encroach upon it.

sense.def: wealthy person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146f

tls:text.tls:line: Confidants, close associates, relatives, and favorites were unable to deviate from it.

sense.def: objects of intimate love> friends of all sorts; intimate associates (at court)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146f

tls:text.tls:line: Precious curios and strange objects were unable to tempt them,

sense.def: exquisite things that are conceived as primarily rare, extraordinary and as being of high aesthetic value

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:146f

tls:text.tls:line: Precious curios and strange objects were unable to tempt them,

sense.def: what is amazing and thus to be treasured

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: Nowadays the empire is not the same.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: and scholars of wide learning

sense.def: learned, dedicated to the pursuit of learning 博學之士

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: are able to use their expertise to disrupt the law and confuse their superiors.

sense.def: wisdom (as something to be rejected because insufficient)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.90; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: are able to use their expertise to disrupt the law and confuse their superiors.

sense.def: the leadership, the authorities; one's ruler, the ruler; superiors; persons in high position

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: Great470 ministers are able to use their private resources to subvert the hundred surnames

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: and fleece the public wealth to provide salaries for their private knights.

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: The sage princes were not like this.

sense.def: sagely, sagacious

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: The sage princes were not like this.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: Their ministers were not allowed to appoint their relatives and favorites to office.

sense.def: love intensely; love dearly (also as people loving ruler) 甚親愛

tls:text.tls:srcline: 群臣修通輻湊以事其主，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: Their ministers sought to communicate their ideas and rally round the ruler like the spokes of a wheel in order to serve him.472

sense.def: like the spokes of a wheel

tls:text.tls:srcline: 群臣修通輻湊以事其主，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: Their ministers sought to communicate their ideas and rally round the ruler like the spokes of a wheel in order to serve him.472

sense.def: converge and cooperate systematically (like the spokes of a wheel)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 百姓輯睦聽令道法以從其事。故曰：

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: The hundred surnames united in harmony, obeyed orders, and abided by the law in order to carry out their duties. Therefore it is said:

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147

tls:text.tls:line: and those who pattern themselves on them."

sense.def: take one's model from> emulate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147f

tls:text.tls:line: and those who obey them are the people.

sense.def: take one's model from> emulate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147f

tls:text.tls:line: Now those who do not privately form cliques of people they like,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:147f

tls:text.tls:line: do not privately punish people they dislike,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: Those who privately reward people they like,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: privately punish people they dislike,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: Those who privately reward people their ministers like,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: privately punish those their ministers dislike,

sense.def: unofficially, in a non-official way; for one's own personal purposes; in a way not defined by one's public obligations; in an unlicenced way,unofficially, personally, in an unauthorised way; privately and not on an official public occasion

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: go against public law,

sense.def: "，which is inherently public-spirited and not egotistic"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the enlightened kings controlled six things:

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:text.tls:srcline:
一曰文，
二曰武，
三曰威，四曰德。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: civil power, military power, the power to punish, and the power to be benevolent.

sense.def: civil (rather than military) affairs; political measures (as opposed to military force); the civil rather than military approach to things

tls:text.tls:srcline:
一曰文，
二曰武，
三曰威，四曰德。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: civil power, military power, the power to punish, and the power to be benevolent.

sense.def: military affairs; military action; military approach

tls:text.tls:srcline:
一曰文，
二曰武，
三曰威，四曰德。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: civil power, military power, the power to punish, and the power to be benevolent.

sense.def: awe-inspiring authority; authoritarian legal restrictions

tls:text.tls:srcline:
一曰文，
二曰武，
三曰威，四曰德。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: civil power, military power, the power to punish, and the power to be benevolent.

sense.def: overt charismatic generosity, ability to display magnanimity; goodwill

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: and orders being incomplete

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 2.91; tr. Rickett 1998:148

tls:text.tls:line: and beautiful women are unable to corrupt him.

sense.def: beautiful ladies; female beauty

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:149

tls:text.tls:line: However, the prince doomed to failure is not like this.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:149

tls:text.tls:line: his ministers, the hundred surnames,

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:149

tls:text.tls:line: his ministers, the hundred surnames,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:149

tls:text.tls:line: If they are successful in currying the ruler's favor,

sense.def: V by luck, V through mere luck; be lucky to V, be lucky if one Vs, with luck; if we are lucky...

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:149

tls:text.tls:line: If they are not successful,

sense.def: by any chance

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: When close associates crowd acround expressing their affection and making known their desires to the ruler,

tls:text.tls:srcline: 近者以偪近親愛有求其主，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 2.92; tr. Rickett 1998:150

sense.def: subjective motivation: for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故群臣百姓皆設私立方

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 2.93; tr. Rickett 1998:150

tls:text.tls:line: to establish their private interests,

tls:line.loc: GUAN 45.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 2.93; tr. Rickett 1998:150

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: definite technique, precise method; strategem, trick

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.64; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:161

tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.66; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:161

tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.67; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:161

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.70; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.70; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:text.tls:line: The muddle-headed ruler is not like this.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.70; ed. Dai Wang 3.55; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.74; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.74; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.74; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:162

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.80; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163

sense.def: be all confused

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.80; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163
