tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163

tls:text.tls:line: the hundred surnames will treat doing wrong lightly.

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163

tls:text.tls:line: For this reaon if wicked and depraves persons are employed in national affairs,

sense.def: thoroughly wicked

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163

tls:text.tls:line: For this reaon if wicked and depraves persons are employed in national affairs,

sense.def: govern (a state, as prime minister etc); be de facto in charge of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.i3; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163

tls:text.tls:line: ministers will look to them for advantages.

sense.def: depend on something contextually determinate N2 for N1

tls:text.tls:srcline: 外内朋黨雖有大姦其蔽主多矣

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.i4; ed. Dai Wang 3.56; tr. Rickett 1998:163f

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler has no way of knowing it.

sense.def: form friendship groups

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.87; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:164

tls:text.tls:line: so that they may do as they please.

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是方正之與姦邪不兩進之勢也

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.87; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:164

tls:text.tls:line: This is why uprightness and honesty cannot be promoted along with wickedness and depravity.

sense.def: both the subjects (often indefinite) together

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而困死姦臣無功而富貴

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.88; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:164

tls:text.tls:line: while depraved ministers, though undeserving, will be promoted.

sense.def: become rich and noble

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則為人臣者重私而輕公矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.89; ed. Dai Wang 2.94; tr. Rickett 1998:164

tls:text.tls:line: ministers in general will stress their private interests and treat lightly the public good.

sense.def: that which is private, private affairs; private actions; what is non-official; private benefits; private interests

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.92; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:164f

tls:text.tls:line: When wicked ministers usurp the authority of the ruler

sense.def: wicked, depraved; morally incompetent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.93; ed. Dai Wang 2.94; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: [MF] Ten men will arrive at private gates,

sense.def: private, non-official; not motivated by public obligations, not involved in any official and public function, not concerning public tasks

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.98; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: and supervises their accomplishments.

sense.def: survey, assess and administrate; supervise and scrutinise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.99; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: and exploiting its people in order to enrich their own families.

sense.def: shepherd (the people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.99; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: and exploiting its people in order to enrich their own families.

sense.def: to farm (people) like fish in a fish-farm

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.99; ed. Dai Wang 3.57; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: and exploiting its people in order to enrich their own families.

sense.def: make rich

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.101; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: in achieving order so that the state will be secure.

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.102; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: great ministers use them for their private purposes

sense.def: take personal/private control of; make into one's private property

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.103; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: he is a ruler in name only.

sense.def: name and appearance; appearance; appearances

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.103; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:165

tls:text.tls:line: he is a ruler in name only.

sense.def: concrete reality (versus mere name or title); real facts of a matter; material conditions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.106; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: Since the legal system is rejected and not implemented,

sense.def: the legal system

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.106; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: and no separation between superior and inferior,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.109; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: in order to maintain order among the hundred surnames

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.109; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: and punish robbers and bandits.

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.113; ed. Dai Wang 2.94; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: they selected men on the basis of law

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.113; ed. Dai Wang 2.94; tr. Rickett 1998:166

tls:text.tls:line: and did not depend on their own judgments when elevating them.

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: [MFJ] When the enlightened ruler selects worthy men,

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: [MFJ] When the enlightened ruler selects worthy men,

sense.def: superb worthy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: he tests those who are said to be brave on the basis of their military experience

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are said to be wise on the basis of their experience in office.

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.114; ed. Dai Wang 3.58; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: and who is cowardly and the maintenance of good order while executing official duties as the basis for determining who is stupid and who is wise.

sense.def: intelligence

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.116; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.116; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.117; ed. Dai Wang 2.94; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: and did not depend on their own judgments to make decisions.

sense.def: oneself, in person; by oneself (Perhaps this should be npro+V[PRED]. I do not know how one would argue one way or the other.)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.118; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: is something which contributes to the security of the ruler on high and benefits all the people.

sense.def: the ruler (in a hypothetical case); a (hypothetical) ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.118; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: and that the hundred surnames are free from the catastrophies of death and being taken captive

sense.def: being taken prisoner; arrestation as prisoner [This is an occasional usage, but perhaps it is worth recording and classifying]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 萬民驩盡其力而奉養其主，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.119; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: and that all of the people are content to strive with all their might to support their ruler

sense.def: joyfully, happily (sometimes with weak archaic suffix 言)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.120; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:167

tls:text.tls:line: Correcting the ruler's faults,

sense.def: cause to be proper; to correct

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.123; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:168

tls:text.tls:line: he pays attention to right and wrong

sense.def: rightness or otherwise, appropriateness or otherwise; right and wrong

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.126; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:168

tls:text.tls:line: [MF] Those who would praise the unworthy were not able to advance;

sense.def: engage in publicly praising people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.126; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:168

tls:text.tls:line: those who would slander the worthy were not able to retreat.512

sense.def: engage in censure, engage in public criticism

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.128; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:168

sense.def: engage in publicly praising people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.128; ed. Dai Wang 3.59; tr. Rickett 1998:168

sense.def: engage in censure, engage in public criticism

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.129; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:168

tls:text.tls:line: and since this separation was clear, good order was easily maintained.514

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.130; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:168f

tls:text.tls:line: To post orders and accept regulation

sense.def: look up to for sustenance and necessary support; depend on

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.130; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:168f

tls:text.tls:line: is the role of the minister.

sense.def: lot, fated role

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.130; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:168f

tls:text.tls:line: is the role of the ruler.

sense.def: lot, fated role

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.132; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: Since the ruler and minister are clearly separated,

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.133; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: The minister in taking his ruler as a model

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.136; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: [MFJ] The enlightened ruler grasps political methods and relies on his ministers below.

sense.def: the enlightened ruler; an enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.136; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: [MFJ] The enlightened ruler grasps political methods and relies on his ministers below.

sense.def: wield and use (a weapon or tool; a technique)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.136; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: [MFJ] The enlightened ruler grasps political methods and relies on his ministers below.

sense.def: professional method; professional technique; professional competence; consciously cultivated method of conducting one's affairs, "philosophy"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.136; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: He cause his ministers to contribute their wisdom and ability

sense.def: HF 7.3.8: show up clearly (one's real thoughts); show through action, show in action; deploy in action; make a show of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.136; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: The wise contribute their calculations;

sense.def: offer up; deliver; hand up and give away, surrender, hand over (to the opponent or to an authority); deliver (results, in service of a ruler)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.137; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: On the basis of their previous statements, he scrutinizes their later work.

sense.def: survey, assess and administrate; supervise and scrutinise

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.137; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: If their contribution is proper, he rewards them;

sense.def: achieve (public and visible success) in the service of someone or something; realise; put into practice through commendable effort in some service

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 46.01.137; ed. Dai Wang 3.60; tr. Rickett 1998:169

tls:text.tls:line: By upholding the law, he makes a model of it,

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 古之欲正世調天下者，必先觀國政，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient times, those who wished to rectify the age and regulate the empire took action only after they had first observed closely the political situation within their states,

sense.def: administration of (some state N etc) Note: 夏政 1. administration by the Xia; 2. administration of the Xia kingdom

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: considered carefully their undertakings and affairs,

sense.def: assess; make a rough count of; assess extent of; reckon

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: familiarized themselves with the customs of their people,

sense.def: have a clear understanding of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: reached a fundamental understanding of the causes of order and disorder,

sense.def: get to the bottom of, investigate fundamentally, investigate the reasons of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: reached a fundamental understanding of the causes of order and disorder,

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: RECTIFYING THE AGE, GUAN 47.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:170f

tls:text.tls:line: and the state is not tranquil,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: if his punishments and excecutions are irrational,

sense.def: executions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: if his taxes and levies are too onerous

sense.def: all sorts of taxes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: Since the people's strength will have been drained away,

sense.def: be exhausted vt-pass ???

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: it will lead to excessive punishments and increasing disorder.

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: treat the hundred surnames liberally,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.95; tr. Rickett 1998:171

tls:text.tls:line: then these excesses lie with those below.

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: Now in ancient times there was

sense.def: an enlightened ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: it was not because they were cruel.

sense.def: be reckless, be callous and cruel; be violent; make violent and abrupt movements

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: Once they are well regulated,

sense.def: (be exposed to>) marker of passivisation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: If robbers and brigands are not vanquished

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: the people will not be secure in their homes.

sense.def: settle peacefully in (a place), be at peace in (a place, also abstractly: a social position)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: the people will not be secure in their homes.

sense.def: home address; place where one lives, one's home; conditions at home

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: If they are not secure in their homes,

sense.def: settle peacefully in (a place), be at peace in (a place, also abstractly: a social position)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:172

tls:text.tls:line: If they are not secure in their homes,

sense.def: home address; place where one lives, one's home; conditions at home

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: No blessing is greater than good order;

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: No blessing is greater than good order;

sense.def: than (introduces the object of comparison after a stative verb in comparative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: no harm greater than disorder.

sense.def: than (introduces the object of comparison after a stative verb in comparative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: yet punishments are light and criminal activities are not exposed,

sense.def: disclose (incriminating) facts

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則是長淫亂而便邪僻也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: this will strengthen depravity and disorder and abet perverse and dissolute behavior.

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: These two factors must be taken into consideration.

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: These two factors must be taken into consideration.

sense.def: should by all means be V-ed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: If supremacy is not achieved over robbers and brigands,

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, nothing is more pressing in the conduct of affairs than having a proper objective.

sense.def: be more urgently needed than

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: When regulating the people, if the ruler acts too hastily, the people will feel oppressed.

sense.def: be pressed upon; be supressed; come under pressure; feel oppressed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: If they feel oppressed, they will feel distressed.

sense.def: be in trouble; be in a precarious situation; be hard pressed; be in straights[or vtpass ??]

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: If they feel distressed, they will lose their feeling of having a secure livehood.

sense.def: preserve

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: must be taken into consideration.

sense.def: should by all means be V-ed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: brilliantly understood the reasons for having order or disorder

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 47.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.96; tr. Rickett 1998:173

tls:text.tls:line: In establishing order among people,

sense.def: population; the population at large; human beings, humankind

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: MAINTAINING THE STATE IN GOOD ORDER, GUAN 48.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:176

tls:text.tls:line: When the people are prosperous, they are easy to keep in order.

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: MAINTAINING THE STATE IN GOOD ORDER, GUAN 48.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:176

tls:text.tls:line: When the people are poor, they are difficult to keep in order.

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:176

tls:text.tls:line: If this occurs,

sense.def: offend against, presumtuously act against

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:176

tls:text.tls:line: they will be difficult to keep in order.

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:176

tls:text.tls:line: did not use the same legal system

sense.def: be united, be unified, be made consistent 不可一

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:177

tls:text.tls:line: fields will be well cultivated.

sense.def: be properly tilled; be properly cultivated

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:177

tls:text.tls:line: If fields are well cultivated,

sense.def: be properly tilled; be properly cultivated

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 2.97; tr. Rickett 1998:177

tls:text.tls:line: while a peasant may work for an entire year

sense.def: farmer; peasant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:177f

tls:text.tls:line: but the sovereign cannot stop them.

sense.def: abscond and then migrate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:177f

tls:text.tls:line: but the sovereign cannot stop them.

sense.def: escape, get away; abscond

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:177f

tls:text.tls:line: This is because there is too little grain and the people have no reserves.

sense.def: stop, hinder, prevent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178

tls:text.tls:line: plants sprout early and die late,

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178

tls:text.tls:line: plants sprout early and die late,

sense.def: after a very long time; late in the day, later rather than earlier

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178

tls:text.tls:line: Planting can be done during all four seasons, and the five grains are all harvested.

sense.def: to harvest (grain)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178f

tls:text.tls:line: and the peasants must sell their children,

sense.def: farmer; peasant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178f

tls:text.tls:line: Since the former kings made the four classes of people: peasants, gentry, merchants, and craftsmen, exchange their skills and perform each other's work,

sense.def: the former kings; one series: 堯舜禹湯文武孝己

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178f

tls:text.tls:line: Since the former kings made the four classes of people: peasants, gentry, merchants, and craftsmen, exchange their skills and perform each other's work,

sense.def: kinds of people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:178f

tls:text.tls:line: Since the former kings made the four classes of people: peasants, gentry, merchants, and craftsmen, exchange their skills and perform each other's work,

sense.def: category of people 五民

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: the fields were well cultivated

sense.def: be properly tilled; be properly cultivated

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: Such is the way of kingliness.

sense.def: this abstract subject (is N)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: and the third time, they formed a state.

sense.def: move house; move place, move about, move around; change course; migrate; move abroad

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: and the third time, they formed a state.

sense.def: semi-urbanised or urbanised settlement; city; town which serves as an administrative centre

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

sense.def: enfeoffed city; administrative centre (of a district); by Han times: capital of a kingdom within the empire; the reference is frequently to a capital: 宋都 would appear to refer to the capital of Sòng and not to any city or administrative centre of of Sòng.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: When agricultural activity is supreme, the income from grain will be plentiful.

sense.def: hand up N1 (concrete things or advice) to the contextually determinate N2

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: even though the sovereign may force change in their customs and habits,

sense.def: current practice

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: This is the merit of paying attention to grain.

sense.def: aim for; be mainly concerned with as one's task, concentrate on, concentrate one's efforts on; strive for (success); be concerned to; devote one's efforts to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 2.98; tr. Rickett 1998:179

tls:text.tls:line: If the sovereign does not benefit agriculture,

sense.def: not benefit> damage

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:180

tls:text.tls:line: he will be known as a prince who is merely clinging to life.

sense.def: living as dependent on the support/tolerance of others

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 48.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:180

tls:text.tls:line: This results from the harm of not benefiting agriculture

sense.def: not benefit> damage

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.01.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:39

tls:text.tls:line: is what gives them life. [it is this that constitutes their life.

sense.def: it is the subject that V-s

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.01.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:39

tls:text.tls:line: When stored in the breast, [when it is

sense.def: chest; the seat of thoughts

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.01.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:39

tls:text.tls:line: How dark! As if entering an abyss.

sense.def: deep abyss

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.01.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:39

tls:text.tls:line: How compact! As if contained within the self.535

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: Is naturally full and naturally replete,

sense.def: fill (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: Is naturally full and naturally replete,

sense.def: fill out

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: Naturally born and naturally perfected.

sense.def: give birth to (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: Naturally born and naturally perfected.

sense.def: make (oneself) perfect and complete; achieve one's own purposes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: It is certain to be due to sorrow and happiness, joy and and anger,539 desire and profit seeking.

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: It is certain to be due to sorrow and happiness, joy and and anger,539 desire and profit seeking.

sense.def: happy overt joy (typically with regard to something)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: If we can rid ourselves of sorrow and happiness, joy and anger, desire and profit seeking,

sense.def: deep communicative happiness 熱鬧的快樂

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: If we can rid ourselves of sorrow and happiness, joy and anger, desire and profit seeking,

sense.def: happy overt joy (typically with regard to something)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.99; tr. Rickett 1998:40

tls:text.tls:line: and its harmony will naturally be complete.

sense.def: make (oneself) perfect and complete; achieve one's own purposes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:41

tls:text.tls:line: The Way is never far removed.

sense.def: be distant; be far away, be far off; be a long way; go a long way

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:42

tls:text.tls:line: Has neither roots nor stalks,

sense.def: stem of a (smallish) plant, stem of a leaf

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:42

tls:text.tls:line: Neither leaves nor blossoms.

sense.def: leaf of a plant 一葉

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:42

tls:text.tls:line: Neither leaves nor blossoms.

sense.def: blossom

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: Spring and autumn, summer and winter,

sense.def: spring 一春

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: Spring and autumn, summer and winter,

sense.def: autumn

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: Spring and autumn, summer and winter,

sense.def: winter

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: Spring and autumn, summer and winter,

sense.def: summer

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: are Heaven's seasons.

sense.def: season; periods of time as defined by the official calendar

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.100; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: His four limbs strong and firm,

sense.def: be strong and firm

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: When the vital force permeates, there is life,

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-f7e4a681-1eb1-4597-9ced-921b54f5c3ea][padV.postN{SUBJ}:adS]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: and with life comes thought.

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-f7e4a681-1eb1-4597-9ced-921b54f5c3ea][padV.postN{SUBJ}:adS]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: With thought comes knowledge,

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-f7e4a681-1eb1-4597-9ced-921b54f5c3ea][padV.postN{SUBJ}:adS]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.06.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:43

tls:text.tls:line: and with knowledge comes a stopping point.

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-f7e4a681-1eb1-4597-9ced-921b54f5c3ea][padV.postN{SUBJ}:adS]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:44

tls:text.tls:line: On being inundated with too much knowledge, loses its vitality.

sense.def: vitality; living quality

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:44

tls:text.tls:line: He is able to become prince over all things.

sense.def: rule over as a ruler; lord it over (subjects or a state)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:44

tls:text.tls:line: The man of quality manipulates things

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:44

tls:text.tls:line: Hence the world is well regulated.

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:44f

tls:text.tls:line: will naturally arrive.566

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:45

tls:text.tls:line: The supremacy of the Spirit:

sense.def: supernatural intelligence; supernatural or cosmic virtues

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:45

tls:text.tls:line: Respectfully keep clean its abode,571

sense.def: remove dirt> keep clean; clear away obstacles from

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.07.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:45

tls:text.tls:line: and its vital essence will naturally come.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:46

tls:text.tls:line: Existing wherever people dwell.

sense.def: equally, evenly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:46

tls:text.tls:line: Circulating about, cover the whole of the nine regions.577

sense.def: the nine regions of the world 揚州，梁州，青州，冀州，雍州，豫州，徐州，兗州，荊州

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:46f

tls:text.tls:line: When our minds are well regulated,

sense.def: one's

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.101; tr. Rickett 1998:46f

tls:text.tls:line: When our minds are at ease,

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47

tls:text.tls:line: When the vital essence is present, it naturally produces life.

sense.def: give birth to (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47

tls:text.tls:line: Outwardly it produces a restful glow.

sense.def: outer appearance

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47

tls:text.tls:line: it becomes the vital force's wellspring.5ǐ

sense.def: feeding source

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: So long as the wellspring does not dry up,

sense.def: deep source for something

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: The four parts of the body5ì will remain firm.

sense.def: be firm, not to be easily moved; solid and good; secure and unshakeable; be staunch. persistent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: So long as the wellspring is not exhausted,

sense.def: become dry; dry out

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: The passages of the nine apertures will remain clear.585

sense.def: opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is possible to explore the limits of Heaven and Earth

sense.def: investigate thoroughly (often used in analytical contexts)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: and cover the four seas.

sense.def: reach all across

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.05; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:47f

tls:text.tls:line: and cover the four seas.

sense.def: the Four Seas and what is encircled by them

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48

tls:text.tls:line: His mind is complete within,

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48

tls:text.tls:line: his form complete without,

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.08.06; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48

tls:text.tls:line: Encountering neither Heaven-sent calamities

sense.def: encounter (something undesirable)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.09.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48

tls:text.tls:line: his flesh will be plump and full,

sense.def: rare in later literature and archaic: SHUOWEN be abundant, be ample (But note that most attested usages are figurative and psychological involving "generosity".)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.09.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48f

tls:text.tls:line: he daily renews his Power.

sense.def: renew, make new (i.e. redo what existed before, NOT: create something new)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.09.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:48f

tls:text.tls:line: and thoroughly examines its four extremities.

sense.def: the whole world, right down to the most distant places

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:49

tls:text.tls:line: When a complete595 mind lies within,

sense.def: completely well-developed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:49

tls:text.tls:line: it cannot be concealed.

sense.def: be hidden

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.102; tr. Rickett 1998:49

tls:text.tls:line: it cannot be concealed.

sense.def: be hidden away

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.11.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:51

tls:text.tls:line: Rather than seeking it in others, can you find605 it within yourself?

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.11.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:51

tls:text.tls:line: Sorrow and melancholy produce illness.

sense.def: melancholy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.11.04; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:51f

tls:text.tls:line: Long life will naturally be achieved.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.12.01; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:52

tls:text.tls:line: When they are in harmony, there is life.

sense.def: P [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-f7e4a681-1eb1-4597-9ced-921b54f5c3ea][padV.postN{SUBJ}:adS]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.12.02; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:52

tls:text.tls:line: this brings long life.

sense.def: occasionally in bamboo strip Warring States texts (Guodian, Ziyi): therefore

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 49.12.03; ed. Dai Wang 2.103; tr. Rickett 1998:52

tls:text.tls:line: and get rid of the two violent emotions.610

sense.def: those who are violent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: will also use the opinions of others when it comes to firing.

sense.def: make use of the services of (a horse etc), employ (armed force etc); employ (a person); make proper use of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:202f

tls:text.tls:line: to reveal one's own strengths and weaknesses. In measuring the seven types of ministers

sense.def: bring politically into line

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:202f

tls:text.tls:line: Ah! How marvelous!

sense.def: alas

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:203

tls:text.tls:line: and his court no wicked ministers.

sense.def: wicked, depraved; morally incompetent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:203

tls:text.tls:line: and in his generation no punishments are applied to the people.

sense.def: (punish by mutilation>) punish harshly, punish physically; mutilate

tls:text.tls:srcline:
惠主：
豊賞厚賜以竭藏，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler who is overly kind: Grants lavish rewards and rich gifts, thereby exhausting his treasury.

sense.def: lenient

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Pardons wickedness and permits error, thereby harming his laws.

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Pardons wickedness and permits error, thereby harming his laws.

sense.def: wicked person; moral incompetent person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Pardons wickedness and permits error, thereby harming his laws.

sense.def: forgive; let off lightly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Pardons wickedness and permits error, thereby harming his laws.

sense.def: do damage to (abstract things); do abstract damage to or hurt (persons)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
侵主：
好惡反法以自傷，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:203f

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler who is domineering: Indulges evil and violates the law, thereby harming himself.

sense.def: damage (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:204

tls:text.tls:line: his ears absorbed in the five notes,

sense.def: tone

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:204

tls:text.tls:line: Of his surrounding neighbors, he takes no account,

sense.def: all the neighbours

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:204

tls:text.tls:line: Of his surrounding neighbors, he takes no account,

sense.def: consider carefully, think about, take into proper consideration in one's calculations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.1; tr. Rickett 1998:204

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, his ministers and subordinate officials are unrestrained,

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:204f

tls:text.tls:line: Punishes with great severity and grants no pardons.

sense.def: sternly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:204f

tls:text.tls:line: Punishes with great severity and grants no pardons.

sense.def: mete out severe punishments to people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:204f

tls:text.tls:line: Since his ministers and subordinate officials are terrified

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:204f

tls:text.tls:line: his laws and policies will daily decline in effectiveness,

sense.def: several, a number of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, he does not trust his ministers and subordimate officials,

sense.def: one's (hypothetical) subordinates, ministers of all kinds

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Now, whether a person is well organized or not depends on his mind.

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: Whether a country continues to exist or not depends on its ruler.

sense.def: (abstractly:) be present in (a person); consist in; belong to; reside in

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205

tls:text.tls:line: his people will like to clear weeds.698

sense.def: weed out, weed away

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205f

tls:text.tls:line: If the ruler is fond of the ornate and brightly colored,

sense.def: find attractive, be deeply fond of (persons, things, or courses of action); be disposed to love; be preoccupied by; like; sometimes specifically: LY 4.3 be truly fond of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205f

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Chu was fond of small waists

sense.def: find attractive, be deeply fond of (persons, things, or courses of action); be disposed to love; be preoccupied by; like; sometimes specifically: LY 4.3 be truly fond of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205f

tls:text.tls:line: The king of Wu was fond of swordplay

sense.def: find attractive, be deeply fond of (persons, things, or courses of action); be disposed to love; be preoccupied by; like; sometimes specifically: LY 4.3 be truly fond of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205f

tls:text.tls:line: and so the country's knights treated death lightly.

sense.def: distinguished gentlemen of the state

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:205f

tls:text.tls:line: are things all the world hates.

sense.def: all the subjects; the whole lot of the subjects at the same time

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: How much more this becomes the case when amusements and music are involved.

sense.def: how much more

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: How much more this becomes the case when amusements and music are involved.

sense.def: indulgently happy; joyful

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: but devote their labor and skill to useless things,

sense.def: work hard at

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: to expect the land to produce699

sense.def: storehouses

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: If the land does not produce,

sense.def: be barren; be non-productive

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: How do we know this to be so?

sense.def: prove, give proof of; prove the truth of (words); also: give proof of an ability one has 何以效之 ？

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.2; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: How do we know this to be so?

sense.def: prevailing conditions, what prevails; what is so; (something's) being so

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: He execued the worthy and loyal,

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: and he never wearied of drums and music.

sense.def: without ever getting fed up with V-ing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: With three thousand talented702 female musicians,

sense.def: female musical entertainer (mostly plural)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: With three thousand talented702 female musicians,

sense.def: measure-word for humans 生子二人

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: The hundred surnames were exhausted,

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: The hundred surnames were exhausted,

sense.def: be exhausted vt-pass ???

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: The hundred surnames were exhausted,

sense.def: be exhausted

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206

tls:text.tls:line: and men of quality had nothing to do.

sense.def: the gentlemen (of a certain time or place) 其君子

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此營於物而失其情者也，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206f

tls:text.tls:line: This is to be preoccupied with material things and to lose one's true nature,

sense.def: aim for, plan for; be preoccupied by

tls:text.tls:srcline: 愉於淫樂而忘後患者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206f

tls:text.tls:line: to find happiness in licentious pleasure and forget the disasters to follow.

sense.def: feel mildly happy with; feel happily at ease with

tls:text.tls:srcline: 愉於淫樂而忘後患者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:206f

tls:text.tls:line: to find happiness in licentious pleasure and forget the disasters to follow.

sense.def: licentious pleasures

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, granaries and storehouses are not to be emptied thoughtlessly,

sense.def: storehouses

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, granaries and storehouses are not to be emptied thoughtlessly,

sense.def: be emptied

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: laws and orders are not to be confused thoughtlessly,

sense.def: laws and orders

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: and state and family are not to be lost thoughtlessly.

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.18; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: harvests may be rich or poor,

sense.def: disastrousness, poverty (ofharvest); disastrous outcomes

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故游商得以什伯其本也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: itinerant merchants will reap profits from ten to a hundredfold.

sense.def: a hundred times as much as

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故游商得以什伯其本也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: itinerant merchants will reap profits from ten to a hundredfold.

sense.def: basic capital; capital input

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: That the hundred surnames cannot devote themselves to their fields

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:207

tls:text.tls:line: That the hundred surnames cannot devote themselves to their fields

sense.def: work in the fields

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: no felling of large trees,

sense.def: cut down (trees), hew off (branches)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
秋毋赦過、
釋罪、緩刑。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: In the autumn, there should be no forgiving of errors, treating criminals leniently, or commuting punishments.

sense.def: set aside> forgive personally (crimes); let go free (Note 釋其罪)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
秋毋赦過、
釋罪、緩刑。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 3.3; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: In the autumn, there should be no forgiving of errors, treating criminals leniently, or commuting punishments.

sense.def: slacken, relax, make lighter (punishments)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: If all four of these are violated,

sense.def: be offended against; be sabotaged

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: the Yin and Yang will not be in harmony,

sense.def: be harmonious, be in harmonious good order; be concordant; be well balanced

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:208

tls:text.tls:line: and raging fires will scorch the earth and burn its plants.

sense.def: burn

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: and raging fires will scorch the earth and burn its plants.

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:209

tls:text.tls:line: The mountains will swarm with bugs and mosquitoes.713

sense.def: there are/were many; be many; be much in quantity, be considerable in extent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:209

tls:text.tls:line: The mountains will swarm with bugs and mosquitoes.713

sense.def: kind of caterpillar; insect which harms grain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.28; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:209

tls:text.tls:line: people in large numbers will die young,

sense.def: die young

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.29; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:209

tls:text.tls:line: become a pursuing rebel's cavalry.

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:209f

tls:text.tls:line: The enlightened kings knew this to be so

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:210

tls:text.tls:line: Laws, adminitrative statues, and official orders,

sense.def: laws and regulations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:210

tls:text.tls:line: are the compass, square, and marking line of government functionaries and the people.

sense.def: compass and square

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:210

tls:text.tls:line: are the compass, square, and marking line of government functionaries and the people.

sense.def: guideline; an abstract line (e.g. defining what is right and proper, or between what is legal and what is not)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:210

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, the enlightened kings paid special attention to the law, took care to preserve their political power,

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:210f

tls:text.tls:line: men who engage in slander and empty praise will stand at his side.716

sense.def: beside the contextually determinate N, =其側

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: The enlightened kings knew this to be so.

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.36; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: It was like dropping something heavy from a high place

sense.def: cause something to fall down; drop

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the hundred surnames719 came to bear no resentment against the one on high.720

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: and never engages in empty blame or praise.

sense.def: censure, public criticism; defamation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: and never engages in empty blame or praise.

sense.def: public praise; high praise (CHECK PRONUNCIATION FOR THIS READING)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: Since the minister adheres to the law, the payment of bribes is stopped

sense.def: bribery

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: Since the minister adheres to the law, the payment of bribes is stopped

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: Ah! How marvelous!
