tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.4; tr. Rickett 1998:211

tls:text.tls:line: Ah! How marvelous!

sense.def: alas!; ah!

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212

tls:text.tls:line: The minister who curries favor:722 Sets up scores723 of bells and drums

sense.def: in large numbers, one a wide scale; in large quantities on a large scale; referring to the object: many objects; most subjects

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212

tls:text.tls:line: The minister who curries favor:722 Sets up scores723 of bells and drums

sense.def: produce (fruit etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212

tls:text.tls:line: Being confused, the sovereign takes no account of quarrels with his neighbors,724 and [being afraid to speak up],

sense.def: all the neighbours

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212

tls:text.tls:line: Being confused, the sovereign takes no account of quarrels with his neighbors,724 and [being afraid to speak up],

sense.def: consider carefully, think about, take into proper consideration in one's calculations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.41; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212f

tls:text.tls:line: The stupid minister: Considers exaggerating the seriousness of crimes and the intensification of punishments as a proper course of action.

sense.def: intellectually stupid and morally insensitive (of persons and opinions etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.41; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212f

tls:text.tls:line: He brings hatred upon himself and causes his ruler to suffer vilification.

sense.def: popular slander, unjustified popular criticism

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.41; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:212f

tls:text.tls:line: Ancient records refered to this by saying: "Stupid loyalty is a slandering thief."

sense.def: slanderous, slandering 讒人

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: The wicked minister: Bemoans human nature in order to gain the attention of his ruler.

sense.def: wicked, depraved; morally incompetent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: His cohorts then level criminal accusations against the innocent.

sense.def: level criminal charges against, hold criminally guilty/responsible; charge with a crime, take legal action against 下吏 "turn over to the prosecutor", 定罪; threaten legal action against;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: His cohorts then level criminal accusations against the innocent.

sense.def: innocent person 殺三不辜, 一不辜

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.42; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: Once the innocent have been charged,

sense.def: innocent person 殺三不辜, 一不辜

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: Makes use of criticism to buy a name for himself while going along with [mistaken policies]

sense.def: aquire by venal means 買譽

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 52.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 3.5; tr. Rickett 1998:213

tls:text.tls:line: Makes use of criticism to buy a name for himself while going along with [mistaken policies]

sense.def: reputation; (good or bad) name;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON MAINTAINING RESTRAINT, GUAN 53.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215

tls:text.tls:line: When restraint is maintained within one's breast,

sense.def: chest; the seat of thoughts

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON MAINTAINING RESTRAINT, GUAN 53.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215

tls:text.tls:line: is possible only if one takes the self to know others.

sense.def: in accordance with (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON MAINTAINING RESTRAINT, GUAN 53.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215

tls:text.tls:line: is possible only if one takes the self to know others.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215f

tls:text.tls:line: Likewise, when the enlightened kings declined to make their palaces elegant,

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215f

tls:text.tls:line: Likewise, when the enlightened kings declined to make their palaces elegant,

sense.def: beautify, make particularly beautiful

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore one should first pay attention to the self and only afterward to others.734

sense.def: be diligent and cautious with respect to (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:215f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore one should first pay attention to the self and only afterward to others.734

sense.def: 而自得之於己乎？(mostly contrastive:) himself, herself, themselves

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:216

tls:text.tls:line: means that the laws will be easy to apply and the people will be free from harm.

sense.def: remain complete, remain unimpaired; kept out of harm's way, remain safe; remain unharmed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: The enlightened kings knew this to be so

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore made absolutely certain that there should be punishment with no chance of pardon

sense.def: mete out severe punishments to people

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore made absolutely certain that there should be punishment with no chance of pardon

sense.def: pardon culprits

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: is the means to resolve doubts and clarify right and wrong,

sense.def: rightness or otherwise, appropriateness or otherwise; right and wrong

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the enlightened kings paid close attention to it

sense.def: the entlightened king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the enlightened kings paid close attention to it

sense.def: pay careful attention to; show special care for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: and would not alter it even for the sake of relatives or old and valued friends.

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 民不以珠玉重寶犯其禁。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.6; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: and the people did not dare739 use pearls, jade, and precious objects to circumvent prohibitions.

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故主上視法嚴於親戚，吏之舉令

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the ruler should treat the law more seriously than his relatives, government functionaries should treat orders

sense.def: the ruler (in a hypothetical case); a (hypothetical) ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: Indeed, if the granting of awards for merit is not done with equanimity,

sense.def: act equitably, be even-handed

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: If the pardoning of crimes is not done consistently,

sense.def: pardon (a crime)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:217

tls:text.tls:line: If the pardoning of crimes is not done consistently,

sense.def: be united, be unified, be made consistent 不可一

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: should be called stupid.

sense.def: intellectually stupid and morally insensitive (of persons and opinions etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: and dispense with idle pleasures, thereby promoting essential production,

sense.def: pleasant playthings, beautiful toys

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: and useless expense,

sense.def: expenditure; cost; expense; lavish use of resources

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: In contrast, ordinary people become intensely involved with material things

sense.def: work at; work with

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: so that they exhaust their strengh

sense.def: embitter through strain, tire out (one's strength)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: and belabor their minds.

sense.def: wear out, tire out

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: and belabor their minds.

sense.def: tire oneself out

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: those of lesser stature will endanger their persons.

sense.def: expose (someone or something) to danger; to put in danger, endanger; to jeopardise; to pose a danger for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: when people obtain what they desire, they are happy,

sense.def: find communicative happiness; be communicatively happy (the optative cases have to be moved!)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: but when they meet with something they dislike, they are distrssed.

sense.def: encounter (something undesirable)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: but it is impossible for energy to be devoted to both at once.

sense.def: be equal 力不能兩 "the strength could not become equal"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218

tls:text.tls:line: but it is impossible for energy to be devoted to both at once.

sense.def: divide or spread in two directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: See that palaces are just sufficient to guard against heat and damp,

sense.def: buildings; all kinds of buildings, any kind of building

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: food and drink are just sufficient to harmonize blood and breath,

sense.def: food in general; nutrition; mealtime

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: clothing is just sufficient to suit the temperature,

sense.def: clothes; garment

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: rules of propriety and ceremony are just sufficient to distinguish the honored from the lowly,

sense.def: various rules of ritual propriety

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: rules of propriety and ceremony are just sufficient to distinguish the honored from the lowly,

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: amusements are just sufficient to provide enjoyment,

sense.def: enjoyments and amusements

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: inner and outer coffins are just sufficient to hols decaying bones,

sense.def: coffins of any kind (inner or outer); coffin system; coffins

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: shrouds are just sufficient to wrap decaying flesh,

sense.def: burial garments, funeral garments

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.7; tr. Rickett 1998:218f

tls:text.tls:line: and grave mounds are just sufficient to mark the burial spot.

sense.def: tombs

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:219

tls:text.tls:line: one's thoughts become settled and one does not let one's vital force and true nature become preoccupied [with material things].744

sense.def: give worries to, make worried, trouble, give trouble to; tire out

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:219

tls:text.tls:line: Consequently, the virtuous prince, on high, observes those who stifled reason

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.19; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:219

tls:text.tls:line: as a check on himself.

sense.def: conceal (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.21; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:219

tls:text.tls:line: Now, conditions of order or disorder

sense.def: relative state of good order or chaos; good order versus chaos

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:219f

tls:text.tls:line: When the merchant engages in trade

sense.def: itinerant merchant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: When the fishman puts out to sea,

sense.def: pertaining to fishing 漁船 "fishing boat"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: When the fishman puts out to sea,

sense.def: go to sea

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: raises his small mast and sails out a hundred li,

sense.def: mast

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Even though it is at the bottom of the deepest depths,

sense.def: below

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: so that the people are naturelly content.747

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: are to grasp the seasons of Heaven as one's standards,

sense.def: leading thread, warp; cardinal principle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: and the minds of people as one's guide to action.

sense.def: basic guideline; rules of conduct

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Groups of ten and five households should serve as a basis for military ranks and columns;

sense.def: group of ten families

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Groups of ten and five households should serve as a basis for military ranks and columns;

sense.def: group of five families

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: rewards and punishments should be viewed as civil and military responses.

sense.def: civil (rather than military) affairs; political measures (as opposed to military force); the civil rather than military approach to things

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.26; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: rewards and punishments should be viewed as civil and military responses.

sense.def: military affairs; military action; military approach

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Push and pull grubbing tools or hoes

sense.def: push forward in one direction (primarily things); also figurative: promote (something), put (something) forward,

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Push and pull grubbing tools or hoes

sense.def: pull (a bow); pull along, pull forward; drag along (a load)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Don rain capes as though they were coats of armor.

sense.def: read pī: wear (cloth); bear (shield etc); abstractly, occasionally: bear (a bad name etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 3.8; tr. Rickett 1998:220

tls:text.tls:line: Don rain capes as though they were coats of armor.

sense.def: body armour made with iron metal plate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: not handling eggs,

sense.def: egg

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: not felling trees,

sense.def: cut down (trees), hew off (branches)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: not picking the buds off young plants,

sense.def: break off; cut off

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: not picking the buds off young plants,

sense.def: blossom; especially: petals 美若英，落英

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: and not breaking their stems751

sense.def: bamboo slip (as writing material)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: are means to nourish growing things.

sense.def: cuase to flourish; nourish

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: Rendering assistance to widower and widow,

sense.def: make presents to (an inferior);

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: providing relief to the orphaned and alone,

sense.def: succour, come to the aid of; save from (e.g. punishment); occasionally: aid and abet

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.31; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: providing relief to the orphaned and alone,

sense.def: those in any way bereaved

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: pardoning light crimes,

sense.def: pardon (a crime)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: pardoning light crimes,

sense.def: slight (punishments, crimes etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.32; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221

tls:text.tls:line: and resolving rivalries [setting free one's mortal enemies]

sense.def: mortal enemy; mortal enemies

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221f

tls:text.tls:line: and to put a stop to robbers and bandits.

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221f

tls:text.tls:line: In the winter, harvesting the five stores (wu zang)755

sense.def: to harvest

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:221f

tls:text.tls:line: and collecting all things

sense.def: collect; accumulate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.37; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:222

tls:text.tls:line: The more private profit is permitted to its people,

sense.def: private, non-official; not motivated by public obligations, not involved in any official and public function, not concerning public tasks

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.38; ed. Dai Wang 3.9; tr. Rickett 1998:222f

tls:text.tls:line: and controls them with groups of five (wu).

sense.def: group of five families

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.39; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:223

tls:text.tls:line: and those who would shift about have no place to stay.

sense.def: migrate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:223

tls:text.tls:line: and his civil functionaries have no worries about chasing after them.

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:223

tls:text.tls:line: and the hearts of the people can be bound to the ruler.

sense.def: be tied to (figuratively, as hearts to a ruler)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:223f

tls:text.tls:line: are means for observing weight.

sense.def: weight

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.46; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:224

tls:text.tls:line: If one such person766 is of two minds,

sense.def: (not one but) two

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:224f

tls:text.tls:line: Offer them bribes

sense.def: make abundant; maximise; cause to be richly supplied, enrich

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 3.10; tr. Rickett 1998:224f

tls:text.tls:line: Offer them bribes

sense.def: bribes

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.49; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:225f

tls:text.tls:line: to serve in plotting stratagems [against other countries].

sense.def: strategic thinking; precise strategic planning; planning based on calculations of profit and loss as well as likelihood of success

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.50; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:226

tls:text.tls:line: the two countries will become enemies,

sense.def: the two (that do not form a natural pair and are determinate in the context)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:226

tls:text.tls:line: Be respectful toward his loyal ministers,

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:226

tls:text.tls:line: and the govenment within is bound to self-destruct.773

sense.def: seriously impair (oneself)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 53.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:226

tls:text.tls:line: Since the loyal ministers will have been killed,

sense.def: (will) already

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON ENTERING THE CAPITAL, GUAN 54.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:227f

tls:text.tls:line: (2) caring for the young,

sense.def: show loving parental or parental-style care for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON ENTERING THE CAPITAL, GUAN 54.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.11; tr. Rickett 1998:227f

tls:text.tls:line: (2) caring for the young,

tls:text.tls:line: that in the capital and all administrative centers (du) there shall be officials charged with looking after the elderly.

tls:text.tls:line: that in the capital and all adminitrative certers there shall be officials charged with looking after young children.

sense.def: major cities of any kind (including the capital and all administrative centres)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: that in the capital and all adminitrative certers there shall be officials charged with looking after young children.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:229

tls:text.tls:line: that in the capital and all administrative certers, there shall be officials charged with looking after orphans.

tls:text.tls:line: and must be taken in by members of the district, family acquaintances, or old friends.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:229

tls:text.tls:line: The officials charged with looking after orphans shall make frequent inquiries about them

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: and whether or not their bodies are emaciated,780 in order to show their concern for them.

sense.def: feel intense and constant sympathy for

tls:text.tls:line: and whether or not their bodies are emaciated,780 in order to show their concern for them.

sense.def: feel sympathy and commiserations as well as affection for; show sympathetic care for

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:229f

tls:text.tls:line: Husbands who have lost their wives are called widowers (guan);

sense.def: husband

tls:text.tls:line: These officials shall bring widowers and widows together

sense.def: the widowers

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:229f

tls:text.tls:line: that in the capital and all administrative certers there are officials charged with looking after the sick.

sense.def: major cities of any kind (including the capital and all administrative centres)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: For ordinary people it shall take place once every five days.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: Officials charged with looking after the sick shall have as their duty travelling throughout the country

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: Officials charged with looking after the sick shall have as their duty travelling throughout the country

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant by "inquiring after the sick."

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant by "inquiring after the sick."

sense.def: major cities of any kind (including the capital and all administrative centres)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: or guests from abroad who have been cut off from their provisions,

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: or guests from abroad who have been cut off from their provisions,

sense.def: foodstuff; food supplies (of an army)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: "Providing relief for those in distress" means

sense.def: succour, come to the aid of; save from (e.g. punishment); occasionally: aid and abet

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: "Providing relief for those in distress" means

sense.def: those in distress

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: that when the harvest is poor

sense.def: turn out disastrously disadvantageous

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: the sovereign shall relax his punishments,

sense.def: make less tight> make less severe, make more lenient

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: the sovereign shall relax his punishments,

sense.def: various kinds of penalties and punishments

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: pardon the guilty,

sense.def: HF 4.2.95: to pardon (someone condemned to a severe form of punishment)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: and distribute stored grain in order to feed them.

sense.def: give something to eat to (a person or sometimes an animal); provide for the subsistene of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant by "providing relief for those in distress."

sense.def: succour, come to the aid of; save from (e.g. punishment); occasionally: aid and abet

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: This is what is meant by "providing relief for those in distress."

sense.def: those in distress

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: or in battle,

sense.def: citizen; citizenry

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 54.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.12; tr. Rickett 1998:230

tls:text.tls:line: to receive funds from the sovereign

sense.def: acquaintances (GUAN)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: If his ministers, rallying around him like the spokes of a wheel,

sense.def: like the spokes of a wheel

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.03.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: Be like a high mountain; looking at it,

sense.def: look up at (Heaven) 仰天

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: Be like a deep abyss; measuring it,

sense.def: deep abyss

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: Be like a deep abyss; measuring it,

sense.def: to estimate; assess objectively the extent of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot plumb its depths.

sense.def: fathomable 不測"unfathomable"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234

tls:text.tls:line: Be like the power of the spirits,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:text.tls:srcline: 刑賞信必於耳目之所見，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234f

tls:text.tls:line: If rewards and punishments are trustworthy and certain in cases where your ears and eyes can hear and see,792

sense.def: be (abstractly) in> depend on; be based on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則其所不見，莫不闇化矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234f

tls:text.tls:line: then even in cases where your ears and eyes cannot hear and see, no one will secretly change his behavior.

sense.def: secretly

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.13; tr. Rickett 1998:234f

tls:text.tls:line: and move the spirits,

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.14; tr. Rickett 1998:235f

tls:text.tls:line: If the prince relies on whatever comes

sense.def: base oneself on (as the the Shang dynasty on the institutions of the Xia), utilise as a basis, utilise as a basis for power; make use of; rely on, take advantage of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.14; tr. Rickett 1998:235f

tls:text.tls:line: he is able to bring [his officials] under control.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 29: hold the reins of control over;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.14; tr. Rickett 1998:236

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler must be secretive,

sense.def: a ruler of men in general

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.14; tr. Rickett 1998:236

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler must be secretive,

sense.def: have to; must; should by all means; should not fail to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 55.09.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.14; tr. Rickett 1998:236f

tls:text.tls:line: Fix names in accordance with realities.

sense.def: in accordance with, basing oneself on

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: QUERIES OF DUKE HUAN, GUAN 56.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:238

tls:text.tls:line: Examine what the people hate and take it as a warning.

sense.def: for the sake of (oneself) 自為

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:238f

tls:text.tls:line: Huang Di set up the discussions at the Ming Tai (Bright Tower)

sense.def: Bright Tower, venue for public discussion 議 established by the Yellow emperor

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: Tang had pavilions located all along the highways

sense.def: large street in a city; main street

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: so he could observe men's criticism.802

sense.def: censure, public criticism; defamation

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: King Wu received reports at the Ling Tai (Spiritual Tower)

sense.def: endowed with supernatural efficacy; endowed with supernatural dignity

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: so that those who were worthy would come forward.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此古聖帝明王所以有而勿失，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: These were the means by which the sage emperors and enlightened kings were able to possess the empire and never lose it,

sense.def: the enlightened kings (of the Xia etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: "to imitate their examples and put into practice such a system.

sense.def: by way of imitation or emulation; acting according to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: "to imitate their examples and put into practice such a system.

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:text.tls:srcline: 有司執事者咸以厥事奉職，而不忘為。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: Officers who handle this matter shall consider it to be their full-time responsibility,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此人能以正事爭於君前者也。」

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 56.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.15; tr. Rickett 1998:239

tls:text.tls:line: This person is capable of standing up to the prince in fighting for what is right."

sense.def: this (remarkable) person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON APPRAISING THE TERRAIN, GUAN 57.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:242

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask how one should appraise terrain

sense.def: ask the question S

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON APPRAISING THE TERRAIN, GUAN 57.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:242

tls:text.tls:line: that the person who is able to become lord protector to the king (bà wáng)

sense.def: hegemon; (predicative: be, become) the preeminent ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: ON APPRAISING THE TERRAIN, GUAN 57.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:242

tls:text.tls:line: is the world's [greatest] sage.

sense.def: the greatest sage in N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:242f

tls:text.tls:line: the sage makes certain it is placed where it may not be overthrown and,

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:243

tls:text.tls:line: "He then partitions his country in order to carry out his administrative and judicial functions.

sense.def: separately

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:243f

tls:text.tls:line: To serve the son of Heaven,809

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:243f

tls:text.tls:line: the son of Heaven has a host of feudal lords,

sense.def: commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.16; tr. Rickett 1998:244

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:245

tls:text.tls:line: There is always danger."

sense.def: state of grave danger; a highly dangerous constellation

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「水可扼而使東西南北及高乎？」

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:245

tls:text.tls:line: "Can water be controlled so that it can be made to flow in any direction and even to a higher level?"

sense.def: the directions; in all directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:246

tls:text.tls:line: but if the land rises, the water is obstructed and pushes back on itself.

sense.def: be controlled and constrained by force

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:246

tls:text.tls:line: When it attempts to change course, it is obstructed and pushes back on itself.

sense.def: be controlled and constrained by force

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.20; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:246

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask the way to guard against these five destructive forces?"

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:247

tls:text.tls:line: Distinguish the number of men and women, adults and children.

sense.def: discern; differentiate between; to treat as separate, to hold apart, make the distinction between

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.22; ed. Dai Wang 3.17; tr. Rickett 1998:247

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.23; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:247

tls:text.tls:line: in nothing those places where there are surpluses or shortages of manpower

sense.def: Buddhist: feature in a thing

tls:text.tls:srcline: 水官亦以甲士當被兵之數，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.24; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:247f

tls:text.tls:line: The local Water Bureau, together with village elders (san1laǒ), village officials, and heads of the groups of five,

sense.def: armoured officers

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:248

tls:text.tls:line: Each group of ten should acquire six baskets, shovels,ǐ0 planks, and earth trampers.

sense.def: round bamboo basket without cover, used for carrying grain, but typically used for carryig earth, carried with straps on the back

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:248

tls:text.tls:line: Each group of ten should acquire six baskets, shovels,ǐ0 planks, and earth trampers.

sense.def: shovel-like instrument for pounding mud into a wooden frame in the process of building walls [ill. in: HAYASHI 1976: pp. 114, tab. 6-6 (see WANG 1993: 227; SUN 1991: 1)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.25; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:248

tls:text.tls:line: Each group of ten should acquire six baskets, shovels,ǐ0 planks, and earth trampers.

sense.def: plank, especially plank used in building

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.27; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:248

sense.def: side (of a road, roadside); one's side 身邊

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:249

tls:text.tls:line: "when Heaven and Earth are dry,

sense.def: be completely lacking in (life-giving) humidity, dead dry; be dry; be dried

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:249

tls:text.tls:line: Order the gentlemen in armor to contruct dikes along the great rivers,

sense.def: armoured officers

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.30; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:249

tls:text.tls:line: Order the gentlemen in armor to contruct dikes along the great rivers,

sense.def: side (of a road, roadside); one's side 身邊

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.33; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: the crops will not be damaged.

sense.def: grain

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.34; ed. Dai Wang 3.18; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: and everywhere mark out their sectors.

sense.def: the (typically marked) border; sometimes by synecdoche the reference is to "area enclosd by the border", and these cases are not easy to separate out.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: "During the three months of summer,

sense.def: when it came to, at (such-and-such a time); during

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: the vital forces of Heaven and Earth grow strong,

sense.def: become strong; grow strong; increase in strength; reach one's full strength

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: the great heat arrives,

sense.def: heat, state of hotness; agreeable warm termperature

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: all living things flourish,

sense.def: be wonderfully flourishing

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.35; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:250

tls:text.tls:line: and it is advantageous to hoe quickly

sense.def: remove; clear away weeds[SHOULD MAYBE BE IN SYN. WEED][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: the mountain rivers and various springs leap forth,

sense.def: leap about (as waves, as the beating heart)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.39; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

tls:text.tls:line: The violent rainsì2 have come to an end,

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.39; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

tls:text.tls:line: The violent rainsì2 have come to an end,

sense.def: stop, fail to go on doing what one was doing; desist MOVE THESE TO THE NEXT LEXEME ENTRY

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

tls:text.tls:line: repair frontier walls,

sense.def: marginal, near the border; on the border; border- 邊吏

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

tls:text.tls:line: empty the prisons,ì3

sense.def: places of detention

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.40; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

sense.def: realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.41; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251

tls:text.tls:line: Shift around civil functionaries who are in charge of offices and rank them.

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.43; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:251f

tls:text.tls:line: "I am puzzled.

sense.def: be misguided, be incoherent (also of actions); look confused

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: If in spring one does not collect withered bones and decaying remains of dead animals,ì5

sense.def: waterless; dried-up; dried (fish) 枯魚 "dried fish"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: cut down withered trees and dispose of them,

sense.def: cut down (trees), hew off (branches)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: cut down withered trees and dispose of them,

sense.def: withered (of wood); dried (fish); fleshless (of bones); dried-up (of marshes)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.44; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: A great many people become ill, and when this does not stop,

sense.def: suffer from a serious illness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.45; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: and cover over all the wells in their fields and dwellings.

sense.def: and (between adnominal nominals)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.45; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: and cover over all the wells in their fields and dwellings.

sense.def: put the lid on, cover, put a lock on (in order to prevent outside things to get in)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.45; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.45; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: Insects may also descend to harm the crops.

sense.def: grain crop; crop, harvest

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.46; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: the event of all these natural calamities,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.46; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: the event of all these natural calamities,

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: On encountering them, some people will die,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: others will live.ì7

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.47; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

tls:text.tls:line: The virtuous prince also avoids them

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.48; ed. Dai Wang 3.19; tr. Rickett 1998:252

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:text.tls:line: village officials,

sense.def: officials in charge 有司皆曰 (usually the reference is definite and plural, when the word is not used predicatively)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.50; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

tls:text.tls:line: How should I handle this?"

sense.def: respond (to a situation or an event), deal with (an enemy)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.51; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

tls:text.tls:line: should be quickly repaired by conscript labour.

sense.def: menial worker employed in a government office; generally: menial subjects, menials

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.52; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

tls:text.tls:line: During heavy rains those parts of the dikes and embankments that can be covered over [with grass mats] should be so covered.

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.53; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

sense.def: block (oneself)

tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.55; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

sense.def: what is said > discourse (this can refer to spoken word and the written word); message

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 57.01.55; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:253

sense.def: be completed, be completely achieved; be completely understood; reach perfection

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: CATEGORIES OF LAND, GUAN 58.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.20; tr. Rickett 1998:259f

tls:text.tls:line: When Guan Zhong brought order853 to the empire,

sense.def: cause to be proper; to correct

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:261f

tls:text.tls:line: and its people872 are unable to settle down.

sense.def: migrate in an unregulated manner

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:262f

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one hears the zhi note, It sounds like a hog that has become aware of being mounted by a smaller pig

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:263

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one hears the yu note, It sounds like the neighing of a horse in the wilds.

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:263

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one hears the gong note, It sounds like the mooing of a cow that has fallen into a pit.

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:263

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one hears the shang note, It sounds like the sheep that has become separated from its flock.

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:263

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever one hears the jiao note, it sounds like a pheasant ascending a tree to crow.

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.21; tr. Rickett 1998:263

tls:text.tls:line: To create the sounds of the five-note scale,

sense.def: whenever (note that the V can be read as an S with an understood subject in many cases: are there any cases of 凡 after an explicit subject???)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.03.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:265f

sense.def: be completely lacking in (life-giving) humidity, dead dry; be dry; be dried

tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.03.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:266

sense.def: aspen tree, "trembling poplar", different from 柳, but often used in conjunction with the willow. Common in SHI. Karlgren: poplar.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:267

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或赤或青或白或黑或黃。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:268

tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:268

tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:268

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:268

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.22; tr. Rickett 1998:268

tls:text.tls:line: that have light green stalks and spikes.

sense.def: flower

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.23; tr. Rickett 1998:269

tls:text.tls:line: sophora (Sophora japonica) and quaking aspen (Populus tremula),

sense.def: aspen tree, "trembling poplar", different from 柳, but often used in conjunction with the willow. Common in SHI. Karlgren: poplar.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

tls:text.tls:line: Several933 fragrant plants also inhabit the area:

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.23; tr. Rickett 1998:270

tls:text.tls:line: The effect of these fragrant plants is to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 58.05.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.23; tr. Rickett 1998:270

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.02.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i1

tls:text.tls:line: the prince is certain to gain a tenfold profit,

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.03.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i2

tls:text.tls:line: all are supplied by the prince.

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.03.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i2

tls:text.tls:line: It is because he is very conscientious about nurturing the essential industry of agriculture.

sense.def: diligence;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.03.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i2

tls:text.tls:line: he uses summer loans to acquire grain from the autumn harvest.

sense.def: to harvest

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i3

tls:text.tls:line: This five special taxes and levies cannot be used all at once.

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i3

tls:text.tls:line: Those who have become kings have used them, but never all of them at the same time.

sense.def: the true kings (of a given time)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.68; tr. Rickett 1998:3i3

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, a true son of Heaven bases his special revenue income on money.

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:3i3f

tls:text.tls:line: In a bad year when the price of grain is expensive,

sense.def: turn out disastrously disadvantageous

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故視國之羨不足而御其財物。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:3i4

tls:text.tls:line: the prince pays attention to his country's surpluses and shortages and manages its wealth and goods.

sense.def: surplus 羨不足

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: His knights in array will have been bound and taken captive,

sense.def: be tied up and arrested, be tied up and imprisoned

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: His knights in array will have been bound and taken captive,

sense.def: be tied up; be bound

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: His knights in array will have been bound and taken captive,

sense.def: be captured so as to be taken prisoner> be taken prisoner

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: His knights in array will have been bound and taken captive,

sense.def: be captured

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: His knights in array will have been bound and taken captive,

sense.def: be captured

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: Such a person is ranked as a prince in name only,

sense.def: only be the NP

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.14; ed. Dai Wang 3.69; tr. Rickett 1998:385

tls:text.tls:line: take advantage of the rise and fall of prices during the four seasons,

sense.def: change (of the seasons); change in price 四時之朝夕

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.18; ed. Dai Wang 3.70; tr. Rickett 1998:386

tls:text.tls:line: gold was placed next,

sense.def: gold

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.04.18; ed. Dai Wang 3.70; tr. Rickett 1998:386

tls:text.tls:line: nor will attempting to eat them help satisfy one's hunger.1142

sense.def: grip; hold (a physical object, probably without a handle) in one's hands; abstractly: keep a grip on, hold on to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.05.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.70; tr. Rickett 1998:387

tls:text.tls:line: the price will fall by 20 percent.

sense.def: (amout of) ten; unit of ten

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 73.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.70; tr. Rickett 1998:387

tls:text.tls:line: but if the order is issued in the morning and payment must be made in full by that night,

sense.def: (amout of) ten; unit of ten

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:390

tls:text.tls:line: the amount of cultivated land is such and such

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:text.tls:srcline: 田軌之有餘於其人食者，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:390

tls:text.tls:line: Where the figures for agricultural production normally exceed what is needed to feed the population,

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:390

tls:text.tls:line: cautiously issue public funds as loans,

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:390f

tls:text.tls:line: If the harvest is fruitful

sense.def: N [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-ea7b4cf1-fe27-4ed9-afb0-7f7fa9950f84][n{PRED}]] /

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.12; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:390f

tls:text.tls:line: 啍he money I advanced to you amounted to such and such.

sense.def: silk used as currency; money

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.14; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:391

tls:text.tls:line: When the excess grain from high-grade land has come under the control of the government at just the right time,

sense.def: the ruler (in a hypothetical case); a (hypothetical) ruler

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:391

tls:text.tls:line: Inform wealthy families and those that have accumulated proterty:

sense.def: pile up on a small scale

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:391

tls:text.tls:line: Inform wealthy families and those that have accumulated proterty:

sense.def: (substantial) property; valuables; assets

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:391

tls:text.tls:line: 偲he funds that have been lent to wealthy families

sense.def: propertied> wealthy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.01.17; ed. Dai Wang 3.71; tr. Rickett 1998:391

tls:text.tls:line: 偲he funds that have been lent to wealthy families

sense.def: lent-out (funds)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此民之所以相并兼之時也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:392

tls:text.tls:line: and when the people can most easily be gathered together.

sense.def: annex (each other etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:392f

tls:text.tls:line: unlined jackets for summer,

sense.def: single; single-layered

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:393

tls:text.tls:line: Households that lack resources of their own

sense.def: (substantial) property; valuables; assets

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:393

tls:text.tls:line: may borrow them.

sense.def: lend out (something N2) (to someone N1) 假我道

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.15; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:393

tls:text.tls:line: the price of grain throughout the state will increase tenfold.

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:394

tls:text.tls:line: I request that we separate them according to the appearance of their foreheads and teeth.1159

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.02.16; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:394

tls:text.tls:line: We should then tell these people: 'The state is about to organize a military force,

sense.def: armed forces, armies

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:394

tls:text.tls:line: The number of horses broken to saddle will then number a thousand

sense.def: read pī: wear (a saddle, as of horses)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.72; tr. Rickett 1998:394

tls:text.tls:line: The number of horses broken to saddle will then number a thousand

sense.def: saddle

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.03.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: Trees that are small enough in diameter to be grasped in the hand or even smaller are for firewood.

sense.def: QIMINYAOSHU: small pieces of wood

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: All below will be peaceful and there will be no resentment or criticism.

sense.def: resentful recrimination

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: All below will be peaceful and there will be no resentment or criticism.

sense.def: moral blame; recriminations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: wealthy families that provide their relatives with lavish funerals

sense.def: blood relation, blood relations.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: Wealthy families that build elaborate, palatial mansions

sense.def: imposing, great

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: Wealthy families that build elaborate, palatial mansions

sense.def: stately building; palace

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: Wealthy families that build elaborate, palatial mansions

sense.def: general term for a house or living space (of a commoner, an aristocrat or even the emperor); one's living space within a house; private quarters; home

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: will pay huge fees,

sense.def: land tax, tax based on fields tilled; land rent

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 74.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:395

tls:text.tls:line: while poor families that live in cottages and thatched huts

sense.def: hut; simple hut (often built next to a tomb to house the mourner during the mourning period)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: METHODS FOR COPING WITH CHANGE, GUAN 75.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:396

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about methods for coping with change?"

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故王者歲守十分之參，三年與少半

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:397

tls:text.tls:line: Now the kingly ruler retains 30 percent of the harvest each year and in three and one-third years acquires the equivalent of a full year's harvest.

sense.def: the true king

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:397

tls:text.tls:line: and the peasants will still treat their work seriously by continuing to work hard.

sense.def: farmer; peasant

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:397

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when Heaven sends down harm in the form of fierce droughts and major floods,

sense.def: calamitious (of years) 凶年，凶器

tls:text.tls:srcline: 民無入於溝壑乞請者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.73; tr. Rickett 1998:397

tls:text.tls:line: people will not end up starving to death in ditches or being reduced to beggary.

sense.def: the ditches, gullies and waterways (into which dead bodies are thrown)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:398

tls:text.tls:line: may rise tenfold over what it was before."

sense.def: be ten times superior to; be tenfold in relation to 相十

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:398

tls:text.tls:line: and be forced to become each other's secret slaves.

sense.def: serve as slave to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.01.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:398

tls:text.tls:line: This is entirely the result of failing to cope with the changes wrought by the three, Heaven, Earth, and people."

sense.def: assertive combination of final particles

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:399

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about the state's fixed system [of economic policies]?"

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: "understands methods involving the large and small fields,11ì

sense.def: relative size (of territory or cloth)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: "Maintain a secure grasp of statistics,

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: By employing the method of alternately relaxing and intensifying government demands

sense.def: slowing down

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.74; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: By employing the method of alternately relaxing and intensifying government demands

sense.def: speeding up, enforcing urgently

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: the statē185 will not receive any support in return.

sense.def: help, support

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: If the prince does not exalt compassion and respect for elders,

sense.def: loving care for senior relatives

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: his people will be rude toward their relatives and make light of transgressions.

sense.def: be neglectful; be slipshod, unattentive, rough and ready, without polite attention to detail

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: his people will be rude toward their relatives and make light of transgressions.

sense.def: blood relation, blood relations.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.03.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:400

tls:text.tls:line: and the exaltation of benevolence, compassion, and respect for elders,

sense.def: loving care for senior relatives

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about methods of instruction?"

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401

tls:text.tls:line: The same should also be done

sense.def: an acute illness

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, do not let military service interfere with them in any way.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401

tls:text.tls:line: Thereafter, one should establish boundaries [limiting the circulation of goods],

sense.def: fix boundaries for, set definite boundaries for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401

tls:text.tls:line: and the expertise of five types of officials."

sense.def: expertise, professional skill

tls:text.tls:srcline: 易者所以守凶吉成敗也，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:401f

tls:text.tls:line: Experts on the Book of Changes (Yi) may be used to foretell calamity or happiness,1191 success or failure,

sense.def: good luck; lucky outcome

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:402

tls:text.tls:line: and everything flourishes.

sense.def: flourish

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:402

tls:text.tls:line: and everything flourishes.

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:402

tls:text.tls:line: Experts on the Book of Changes [as well as divination by tortoise shell] foretell calamity or happiness, bad fortune or good so that confusion will not arise.

sense.def: disaster; disastrous fate, unhappy outcome; bad luck; sad fate

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.04.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.75; tr. Rickett 1998:402

tls:text.tls:line: Experts on the Book of Changes [as well as divination by tortoise shell] foretell calamity or happiness, bad fortune or good so that confusion will not arise.

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:402

tls:text.tls:line: but what about insuring the stability of the state?"

sense.def: get to hear about, come to learn about

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: and knowledge is their chief support in securing a livelihood.

sense.def: support, help

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: The crucial factor in handling affairs of state

sense.def: crucial point; crucial initiative; decisive mechanism; device

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: lies simply in relaxing

sense.def: slowing down

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: lies simply in relaxing

sense.def: speeding up, enforcing urgently

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: is criticising something in the past in order to give warning about the future.

sense.def: declare wrong> criticise; disagree with, deny; disapprove, be opposed to; oppose

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: is criticising something in the past in order to give warning about the future.

sense.def: what is past> the past, what has already happened; matters of the past; the first thing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: is criticising something in the past in order to give warning about the future.

sense.def: warn and instruct, admonish

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: is criticising something in the past in order to give warning about the future.

sense.def: what is to come, the future; the next thing

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: As a result disasters will not sprout or get wide-spread,

sense.def: begin to arise, come into existence 未萌

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.05.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: and the people will not suffer natural disasters or recrimination."

sense.def: moral blame; recriminations

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: "Let me hear more about controlling the hearts of people by instituting proper restraints."

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: "The state of Jin had a minister who was disloyal to his prince

sense.def: do one's devoted loyal best for N (also, by way of exception, to the people! ZUO 2.6)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403

tls:text.tls:line: "We must gain control of a spirit and use it as a treasure."

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 75.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.76; tr. Rickett 1998:403f

tls:text.tls:line: "What do you mean by this?"
