sense.def: silver

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: if lead lies near the surface,

sense.def: lead (metal)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: silver ore may be found below.1263

sense.def: mineral ore

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: silver ore may be found below.1263

sense.def: silver

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: If cinnabar lies near the surface,

sense.def: cinnabar

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: If magnetite is found near the surface,

sense.def: magnetite

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: one should take care to seal it off and declare it forbidden territory.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: should be sentenced to death with no pardon.

sense.def: be forgiven, be pardoned; also: be aquited because not guilty

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:424

tls:text.tls:line: should have their left foot cut off.

sense.def: be cut up; be cut off

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: has used the resources of Heaven and the benefits of Earth to establish great merit and make a name for himself in the world?"

sense.def: who

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: replied Guanzi.

sense.def: See 周文王

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: replied Guanzi.

sense.def: See 周武王

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: replied Guanzi.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: "Now jade comes from the mountains bordering on the territory of the Niuzhi,1264

sense.def: marginal, near the border; on the border; border- 邊吏

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: The distance to these places from Zhou extended 7,800 li,

sense.def: these things

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.02.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.i4; tr. Rickett 1998:425

tls:text.tls:line: to regulate the use of their lowest (copper coins) and highest (pearls and jade) forms."

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.03.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:426

tls:text.tls:line: and the price of the country's grain rose twenty times.

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此三者亦可以當武王之數。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:426

tls:text.tls:line: These three are all suited to using King Wu's method.

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:427

tls:text.tls:line: Each month an adult male will consume five and a third sheng per month,

sense.def: adult male

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:427

tls:text.tls:line: and adult female three and a third sheng,

sense.def: a woman (married or definitely of marriagable age i.e. above 15)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:427

tls:text.tls:line: and a child two and a third sheng.1276

sense.def: small (still breast-feeding) baby; child (of playing age)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:427

tls:text.tls:line: requisitioning and stockpiling some thirty thousand zhong of it.1280

sense.def: collect and amass, typically on a large scale

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.04.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:427f

tls:text.tls:line: You should take this salt, which has increased in price fortyfold,

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然則吾民常為天下虜矣。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.85; tr. Rickett 1998:428

tls:text.tls:line: and our people will forever be their captive slaves.

sense.def: work-slave (who was often a foreigner and/or prisoner)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.06.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:428

tls:text.tls:line: and it is a thoroughfare for travelers and successfus merchants.

sense.def: take (literally) as one's thoroughfare/path

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然后天下之寶壹為我用。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:428f

tls:text.tls:line: Then, the treasures of the empire will all be for your use alone.

sense.def: completely, wholly; (before negatives) not at all 壹不知 "do not at all understand"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然后天下之寶壹為我用。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 77.06.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:428f

tls:text.tls:line: Then, the treasures of the empire will all be for your use alone.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: CALCULATIONS AND MEASURES, GUAN 78.01.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:430f

tls:text.tls:line: "Is it possible for me to hear about the major systems for calculating state finances that have been in existence

sense.def: since the time of N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: he took care to ban the use of armed force

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: he took care to ban the use of armed force

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: he took care to ban the use of armed force

sense.def: weapons

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: His burning off the mountain forests,

sense.def: cause to burn, set fire to; (slash and) burn; burn up so as to destroy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: His burning off the mountain forests,

sense.def: mountain forest; mountains and forests;

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: setting fire to the marshlands,

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: and chasing away the wild animals

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: They overcame wild animals1293

sense.def: wild animals generally (not necessarily including both birds and beasts) 禽獸之皮

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431

tls:text.tls:line: They overcame wild animals1293

sense.def: enemy, mortal enemy

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431f

sense.def: GUAN: lapel

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431f

tls:text.tls:line: in order to purchase tiger and leopard skins.

sense.def: buy in the market; buy; go shopping for

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.01.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.86; tr. Rickett 1998:431f

tls:text.tls:line: in order to purchase tiger and leopard skins.

sense.def: tiger- and leopard-like beasts; tigers and leopards

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.02.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:432

tls:text.tls:line: the empire will be well-regulated,'

sense.def: be in good order; be well-governed, be well-ordered; of persons: be in good shape

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.02.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:432

tls:text.tls:line: These two and five are the most important factors in ruling a state

sense.def: crucial point; crucial initiative; decisive mechanism; device

tls:text.tls:srcline: 「自言能為司馬不能為司馬者，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.03.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:432f

tls:text.tls:line: "Anyone who has claimed to be capable of being minister of war (Sima), When found to be incapable,

sense.def: claim (oneself) to V [Indirect speech!)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 自言能為官不能為官者，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.03.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:432f

tls:text.tls:line: Anyone who has claimed to be capable of being an office head,1303 When found to be incapable,

sense.def: claim (oneself) to V [Indirect speech!)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.04.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:433

tls:text.tls:line: "May I ask about failing to maintain stability?"

sense.def: may I ask about the abstract subject N

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.04.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:433

tls:text.tls:line: and not yourself.

sense.def: it is/was not the SUBJECT N that PREDICATED V

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.04.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:434

tls:text.tls:line: This is not some disaster wrought by Heaven,

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.04.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.87; tr. Rickett 1998:434

tls:text.tls:line: but one created by humans.

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.04.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.88; tr. Rickett 1998:434

tls:text.tls:line: Within the range of this 30 percent, the traders will buy and sell in the market,

sense.def: shop in the market, buy things in the market; do trade in the market

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.05.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.88; tr. Rickett 1998:435

tls:text.tls:line: he should set up contracts and see that they are executed.

sense.def: contract

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.05.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.88; tr. Rickett 1998:435

tls:text.tls:line: people will have no place to go;

sense.def: keep faithfully and earnestly to the path of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.07.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.88; tr. Rickett 1998:436

tls:text.tls:line: Thereby you will accumulate excess grain and store up surpluses in order to provide rewards [for meritorious ministers, knights, and officials].

sense.def: surplus supplies

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.07.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.88; tr. Rickett 1998:436

tls:text.tls:line: When the rest of the world comes as guests to offer service

sense.def: submit to become a respected subject

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.08.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:436f

tls:text.tls:line: it will become united as one.

sense.def: become united

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.08.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:436f

tls:text.tls:line: Accordingly, people of the empire

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.08.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:437

tls:text.tls:line: but make it impossible for them not to be employed.

sense.def: will certainly; willy nilly have to; inevitably will; certainly would have

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.08.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:437

tls:text.tls:line: but make it impossible for them not to be used."1314

sense.def: will certainly; willy nilly have to; inevitably will; certainly would have

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.09.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:437

tls:text.tls:line: the feudal lords will have their grain flow in our direction

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:437f

tls:text.tls:line: 乿nife money

sense.def: Jia Yi, dao Quyuan: small canal, drain (which cannot hold a large fish)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: 偞rders are more to be valued than treasure;

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: altars to Land and Grain are more to be valued than parents'?"

sense.def: our (one's) nation, national ancestral and moral heritage

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: altars to Land and Grain are more to be valued than parents'?"

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此社稷之所重於親戚者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: This is the reason why altars to Land and Grain are more to be valued than parents.

sense.def: our altars of the land and grain; the altars of the land and grain of the subject of the sentence

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此社稷之所重於親戚者也。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: This is the reason why altars to Land and Grain are more to be valued than parents.

sense.def: our (one's) nation, national ancestral and moral heritage

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此社稷之所重於親戚者也。

tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.10.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.89; tr. Rickett 1998:438

tls:text.tls:line: This is the reason why altars to Land and Grain are more to be valued than parents.

sense.def: one's relatives, kinsmen; kith and kin; kinfolk

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:439

tls:text.tls:line: a distance of fifty li to its borders on the east, west, south, and north.

sense.def: the directions; in all directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.07; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:439f

tls:text.tls:line: ten thousand qing of cultivated fields1333

sense.def: one hundred mǔ of land.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 東西南北度百五十餘里。

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: at a distance of more than 150 li to its borders on the east, west, south, and north.

sense.def: the directions; in all directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.10; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: a hundred thousand qing of cultivated fields

sense.def: one hundred mǔ of land.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.11; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: at a distance of more than five hundred li to its borders on the east, west, south, and north.

sense.def: the directions; in all directions

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.12.13; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: a million qing of cultivated fields

sense.def: one hundred mǔ of land.

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: "A single male is guan (wifeless),

sense.def: an ordinary person

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.01; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440

tls:text.tls:line: and a person who reaches old age but has no children is du (alone).1336

sense.def: be alone

tls:text.tls:srcline: 君問其若有子弟師役而死者，

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440f

tls:text.tls:line: The prince should ask whether or not there are any who have died in military service

sense.def: ask about (with mostly nominalised sentential object) 問其所以異

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.02; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:440f

tls:text.tls:line: including three-piece sets of burial clothes

sense.def: item of funeral garment

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:441

sense.def: be full-grown, be adult; be fully mature (and not too old or too young)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.13.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.90; tr. Rickett 1998:441

tls:text.tls:line: These are all detailed measures involved in a state plan."

sense.def: these things

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:441f

tls:text.tls:line: certainly stem from the way in which fertilizer and land are misused.1341

sense.def: dust and dung; dung and mud

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:441f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the former kings paid careful attention to this first step.

sense.def: be diligent about, pay painstaking attention to

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:441f

tls:text.tls:line: If production amounts to twice the capital input,1342

sense.def: be twice the amount of, be twice as substantial as

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.03; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:441f

tls:text.tls:line: If it is three times the capital input,

sense.def: be three times the amount of

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.04; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: [surplus grain] will circulate far and near,

sense.def: circulate; be exchanged (like goods)

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: Should production fail to amount to twice the capital input,

sense.def: be twice the amount of, be twice as substantial as

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: but the demands of the government be unlimited,

sense.def: demands

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.05; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: making it impossible for others to travel them alone

sense.def: follow; walk along with a contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.06; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: and the prince will be unable to employ on his behalf the children who have been sold into slavery.

sense.def: sold 鬻子"children that have been sold into slavery"

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: and its price will again increase tenfold.

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.08; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: and loans of new grain to those who lack seed for planting.

sense.def: what is new; the new ones; new stuff

tls:line.title: 管子(en)
tls:line.loc: GUAN 78.14.09; ed. Dai Wang 3.91; tr. Rickett 1998:442

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, there will be no traders able to reap tenfold profits on the sale of grain

sense.def: ten (times) 十倍 "ten times", note also GUAN 77.3.4 four times 二十倍 and 四什倍

tls:line.title: 管子(en)

sense.def: immigrant people, non-native Han people; common people. Can be used synonymously with 民, to denote the mass of ignorant agricultural labourers, and, in a wider use, the governed generally.
